Ya son quince años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Mónica requiere el préstamo para comprar más cosméticos como por ejemplo perfumes y aretes. 

El Banco Comunal “Salud” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Mónica was born in Cusco department.  She is 43 years old, married, and has two children from her marriage.  Mónica currently lives in the same city in which she was born and this is where she carries out her business activities.  Her business is selling beauty products.  She has been in this business for 15 years and it is doing very well.  On this occasion, Mónica needs a loan to buy more cosmetics such as, for example, perfume and earrings.  

The 'Salud' community bank meets once a month in the city of Cusco (Peru).  Cusco is well known for being a very touristy and commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi fiesta and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world (Machu Picchu).

loans.use: to buy more cosmetics, perfume and earrings

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lillian is a married woman with one child who is still too young for school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and rental fees. 

For the past year, she has operated a beauty salon business, operating in a shop with her customers being her neighbours and passersby. In addition, she also operates a coconut selling business through which she earns her other source of livelihood. Lillian dreams of becoming a leading supplier of charcoal and establishing a dressmaking school in the future.

With the Kshs 15,000 loan, she wants to purchase stock for her cosmetic shop, hair relaxer, hair extensions and six sacks of charcoal. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase stock for her cosmetic shop, hair relaxer, hair extensions and six sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean is the father of nine children. He has been a rice farmer for the past 30 years. He will use his Kiva loan to support labor costs during rice production: nursery, transplanting, field management, guarding birds, and lastly, harvesting activities.

With profits from his farming he wishes to invest in his business so that in the future he can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance his farming capacity.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To support labour costs during rice production.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan, es experto en ediciones de video y publicidad. El crédito lo requiere para la comprar una computadora portátil para  llevar los diseños a  sus clientes y de s esta manera hacer presentaciones más profesionales que impresionen a sus potenciales clientes. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda  ubicada en la zona San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz, es soltero  y  no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito esperando crecer como microempresario, por esto es que se canaliza el crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Juan is an expert in video presentations and publicity.  He needs the loan to buy a laptop computer so that he can take his designs to his customers and do more professional presentations that will impress his potential customers.  He lives in his parents’ house located in the city of La Paz’s San Pedro zone.  He’s single and has no children.  This is the first time the client gets a loan and he hopes to grow as a micro businessman and this is why the loan is being channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Abateranankunga Group

texts.fr:
Adrien fait partie du groupe Abateranankunga. Le nom du groupe signifie « aider eux même ». Adrien est né au Rwanda. Il est marié avec 6 enfants de 6 à 16 ans, dont 5 scolarisés.

Adrien est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques et payer la main d’œuvre pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utiliser des engrais chimiques, cultiver peu d’espace et récolter une grande quantité. Dans les prochaines années, Adrien voudrait être parmi les meilleurs cultivateurs de riz dans sa vallée devenir fournisseur de la région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de nourrir ses enfants, les éduquer et s’autofinancer.
texts.en:
Adrien is a member of Abateranankunga Group, which means "helping themselves". He was born in Rwanda. He is married and the father of six children, aged 6 to 16. Five of his children attend school.

Adrien is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers and pay for labor to work in his rice field.

His growth strategy consists in using chemical fertilizers, cultivating a small acreage and yielding a good harvest. In the years to come Adrien would like to become one of the best rice farmers in his valley and become a major supplier in his area. He will use his profit to provide food and education to his children, and to become self-financing.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers and pay for labor to work in his rice field.

loans.name: Mchata Group

texts.en:
Dominica, who is in her early 40s, is single with one grown-up child. She has been selling juice, sodas, water and bites (small cakes) for more than 10 years now. She works from 7 a.m. to 5 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to buy more items which were missing in her stock and to pay household expenses.  She has paid back all her loans successfully. She wants a loan to increase her stock of water, juice, sodas and bites. Her dream is to one day be able to finish building her two-roomed house which she has started building.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Mchata" which has a total of 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: To increase stock of water, juice, sodas and bites (small cakes).

loans.name: Maranata Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MARANATA est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Mathilde est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Mathilde est âgée de 29 ans et vit au Bénin. Mathilde a deux enfants, tous scolarisés, et à sa charge. Mathilde ne vit plus avec son mari. Mathilde a très peu fréquenté l'école. Depuis cinq ans, afin de subvenir à ses besoins et de mieux assurer les différentes charges de ses enfants, Mathilde mène comme activité la vente de poissons frais. Mathilde s'approvisionne en poissonS dans l'une des villes du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Mathilde sollicite un deuxième crédit, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MARANATA. Le premier crédit reçu a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
MARANATA Group is made up of three women who live in the same neighborhood in Benin. For the second time, the group is seeking financial support from Kiva's partner, ALIDé, in order to bolster their businesses.

The group's representative is named Mathilde, and is the one raising her hand in the photograph. She's 29 years old and lives in Benin. She has two children who both attend school, and whom she has to support.

Mathilde no longer lives with her husband. She did not attend school much. For five years, Mathilde has been selling fresh fish to provide for herself and better support her children's various expenses.

She gets her supplies in one of Benin's town. Eager to satisfy her customer and in order to increase her income, Mathilda is seeking a second loan, together with the other members of MARANATA Group. The first loan was repaid without problems.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 33 years old and she is engaged to be married. She sells a small fish called indagara. She has been selling them for the last five years. She buys the fish from Burundi and sells them in Rwanda. Her business has grown in recent years. She would like to reach the level of becoming a wholesaler. In order to do this, she needs a loan to buy more small fish in order to make more profits.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr:
Ablavi est une femme âgée de 41 ans. Elle est mariée å un couturier. Elle a 02 enfants qui sont tous scolarisés. Le premier a 20 ans et le dernier 18 ans.
Ablavi travaille comme revendeuse depuis 11ans. Elle vend à toute personne dans sa boutique. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. 
Ablavi a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes et des habits. 
Dans les prochaines années, Ablavi voudrait agrandir son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit d’assurer l’épanouissement de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ablavi is 41 years old. She is married to a tailor. She has two children both of whom have had schooling. The eldest is 20 years old and the youngest is 18. Ablavi has been working as a retailer for the past 11 years. She sells to all persons who enter her shop. She buys her products in Lome.
Ablavi requested her first WAGES loan cycle to buy pagnes (colorful West African cloth) and other clothing.
In the coming years, Ablavi would like to expand her business. She said that with her profits, she plans to ensure her children's personal fulfillment.

loans.use: Buy pagnes and clothing

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is a married woman with five children, three of whom attend school while two have graduated from school. Christine owns a house that does not have electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.
For the past seven years, Christine has operated a charcoal sales business, selling in a shop to her neighbors and passers-by. In addition she sells herbal soaps, which adds to her income. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her business. She dreams of becoming a leading supplier of charcoal in the future. 
With this loan of 50,000 KES, Christine wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Kiva partner, Yehu, to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Azza

texts.en:
Azza is a married woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.
For the past three years, Azza has operated a retail shop business, selling to her neighbors and passers-by. Azza faces the major challenge of seasonality and theft in her business. She dreams of expanding her business to a wholesale shop in the future.
With this loan of 20,000 KES, she wants to purchase sacks of sugar and rice for resale. She decided to join Kiva partner, Yehu, to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of sugar and rice for resale.

loans.name: Victoria Del Pilar

texts.es:
Victoria nació en el departamento del Ancash al norte del Perú. Actualmente, Victoria tiene 41 años de edad, ella es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. Victoria desde hace 17 años que radica en la ciudad del Cusco y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas, ella es entrenadora de yudo y en sus horas libres trabaja en el IDP (Instituto de Deporte del Perú filial Cusco).  Ya son tres años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. Victoria también se dedica a la venta de uniformes de Yudo. En esta oportunidad Victoria requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo uniformes de yudo. Su sueño de victoria es abrir un restaurante. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de las Nieves” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Victoria was born in Ancash department, in the north of Peru.  She is 41 years old, married, and has three children from her marriage.  Victoria has lived in the city of Cusco for the past 17 years and this is where she carries out her business activities.  Victoria is a judo trainer and in her free time she works at IDP (Sports Institute of Peru - Cusco branch).  She has been in this line of work for three years and is doing very well.  Victoria also sells judo uniforms.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy merchandise such as judo uniforms.  Victoria's dream is to open a restaurant.

The 'Virgen de las Nieves' community bank meets once a month in the city of Cusco (Peru).  Cusco is well known for being a very touristy, commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi fiesta and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world (Machu Picchu).

loans.use: to buy merchandise (judo uniforms)

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria Elena nació en el departamento del Cusco al sur del Perú. Actualmente, Maria Elena tiene 46 años de edad, ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Maria Elena se dedica a la venta de banquita desplegables y sobrillas a pedido del cliente. Desde hace 8 años que se dedica a distribución de productos traídos de la ciudad de Lima. En esta oportunidad Maria Elena requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo banquitos desplegables y sombrillas.  Su sueño de Maria Elena es abrir una agencia de turismo. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de las Nieves” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
María Elena was born in Cusco Department in the south of Perú.  At present, María Elena is 46 years old.  She’s in a common law relationship and has two children.  María Elena sells folding stools and umbrellas based on prior customer orders.  She’s been in business for the last 8 years bringing merchandise from the city of Lima.  On this occasion, Maria Elena needs the loan to buy merchandise like folding stools and umbrellas.  María Elena’s dream is to open a travel agency.

The “Virgen de las Nieves” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area as well as for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and also because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like folding stools and umbrellas.

loans.name: Juana Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma nació en el departamento del Cusco al sur del Perú. Actualmente, Vilma tiene 73 años D. edad, ella es viuda y tiene cuatro hijos. Vilma se dedica a la venta D. comida (Desayuno, Almuerzo y Cena). DesD. hace 40 años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Vilma requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo bolsas D. arroz, botellas D. aceite y otras cosas más. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen D. las Nieves” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Vilma was born in Cusco Department in the south of Perú.  At present, Vilma is 73 years old.  She’s a widow and has four children.  Vilma sells food (breakfast, lunch and dinner).  She’s been in this business for the last 40 years and does very well.  On this occasion Vilma needs the loan to buy ingredients like for example bags of rice, bottles of oil and other things.

The “Virgen D. las Nieves” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area as well as for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and also because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like bags of rice, bottles of oil and other things.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: El señor Jorge, se dedica a la producción de leche y su esposa tiene un puesto de venta de dulces y comida en la puerta del colegio de la comunidad donde viven. El crédito lo requiere para la comprar un par de vacas lecheras para así poder aumentar la producción de leche y generar mayores ingresos. Jorge vive en casa propia ubicado en la localidad de Achacachi  del departamento de La Paz;  es casado y tiene cuatro hijos. Jorge ya obtuvo el año pasado un crédito a través de Kiva y ahora desea repetir la experiencia y acude a sus financiadotes para conseguir este nuevo préstamo.
texts.en: Jorge is a dairy farmer and his wife has a stand selling candy and food at the entrance to the school in their community.  He needs the loan to buy a pair of dairy cows to increase milk production and generate higher income.  Jorge lives in his own house located in Achacachi, La Paz Department.  He’s married and has four children.  Jorge already got a loan through Kiva last year and now he wants to repeat the experience and is calling on its lenders to get this new loan.

loans.use: to buy a pair of dairy cows.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
Ronald nació en el departamento del Cusco al sur del Perú. Actualmente, Ronald tiene 36 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. 

Actualmente, Ronald vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades, él desde hace 20 años que se dedica a la venta de ceviche en un local alquilado. En esta oportunidad  Ronald requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo limón, pescado y otros insumos más. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de las Nieves” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Ronald was born in Cusco Department in southern Perú.  At present, Ronald is 36 years old and is in a common law relationship; he has two children.

Currently, Ronald lives in the city of his birth and where he also carries out his activities.  For the last twenty years he’s been selling ceviche (marinated seafood cocktails) in a leased locale.  On this occasion, Ronald needs the loan to buy ingredients like for example lemons, fish and other things.

The “Virgen de las Nieves” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial zone as well as for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and also because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located here.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like lemons, fish and other things.

loans.name: Las Heroínas De Labranza Group

texts.es:
Éste Banco comunal se llama “Las Heroínas de Labranza”, lo conforman 17 emprendedoras que se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran picadura de leña, fruterías, verdulerías, venta de ropa, venta de miel, ensaladas preparadas, venta de huevos y confección de ropa. Todas ellas pertenecientes a la ciudad de Temuco. 
Carolina tesorera del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra al medio, vistiendo una chaqueta color blanco, un pañuelo color verde y que además usa su cabello tomado.
Se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 10 años, comenzó vendiendo ropa usada y desde hace 6 meses vende ropa nueva. Comenta que le ha ido excelente en sus ventas y que el número de clientes se ha incrementado con el tiempo.  Sus ventas se realizan puerta a puerta. Su mercadería la compra en el barrio Meiggs de la ciudad de Santiago. 
Con el crédito comprará ropa nueva.
Sus metas en su negocio son instalarse con un local establecido, para ofrecer y vender su mercadería. 
Carolina vive junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 11, 7 y 3 años de edad, ella se siente tranquila  y feliz, por lo que comenta no tener sueños pendientes que realizar. 
Carolina está muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios entregados por Fondo esperanza, también disfruta de los talleres que se imparten en las reuniones del Banco comunal. El grupo conformado es muy unido, solidario, ya que además se conocen desde hace dos años. 
Temuco es la capital de la región de la Araucanía. La ciudad se ubica a 670 kilómetros al sur de Santiago (capital de Chile). En sus alrededores se ubican una serie de balnearios lacustres (Pucón, Villarrica) y una flora y fauna nativa muy llamativas, concentrada en parques naturales cercanos. Cabe destacar que en esta región habita el 50% de los mapuches, pueblo indígena, existente en nuestro país.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Las Heroínas de Labranza” and has 17 members who carry out a variety of different lines of work.  Among them are: firewood chopping, fruit stands, vegetable stands, clothing sales, honey sales, sale of prepared salads, egg sales and clothes making.  All of them are from the city of Temuco.

Carolina is the communal bank’s group Treasurer.  In the photo she’s in the center, wearing a white jacket and green scarf; in addition, her hair is gathered up.

She has been selling clothes for the last ten years.  She started out selling used clothes but has been selling new clothes for the last six months.  She comments that she’s done excellently well with sales and that the number of customers has increased over time.  She sells door to door and buys her merchandise in the city of Santiago’s Meiggs neighborhood.  She will use the loan to buy new clothes.  Her business goal is to set herself up in an established locale to display and sell her merchandise.

Carolina lives with her husband and three children who are 11, 7 and 3 years old.  She feels tranquil and happy and comments that she has no unfulfilled dreams.

Carolina is very happy and grateful for the services she’s gotten from Fondo Esperanza.  She also enjoys the workshops that take place during the communal bank meetings.  The group is very united, mutually supportive and the members have known each other for the last two years.

Temuco is the capital of the Araucanía region.  The city is located 670 kilometers south of Santiago (Capital of Chile).  There is a series of lakefront resorts in its surroundings (Pucón, Villarrica) and it has very eye-catching flora and fauna concentrated in nearby natural parks.  It’s worth pointing out that this region is home to 50% of the Mapuche, our country’s indigenous people.

loans.use: to buy new clothes.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es: Maura tiene 34 años, natural de la ciudad de Santa Rosa, es una mujer trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Efraín de 35 años y sus 03 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor bienestar. Maura, acentúa que todo lo que va obteniendo es a base de tenacidad y entrega a sus cultivos de cacao, café y palta, es por ello que trata de dar el mejor cuidado respectivo a sus plantaciones y bajo esa premisa es que muchos de sus compradores se han sentido satisfechos  por la calidad de lo que cosecha. Sin embargo, ella trata de esmerarse a diario y le dedica buen tiempo a sus sembrios y lo realiza conjuntamente con la ayuda de su pareja, sin embargo en tiempos de cosecha necesariamente contrata jornaleros para acelerar en la extracción y carguio de sus productos y fruto a su esfuerzo cotidiano está obteniendo buenos ingresos económicos. Con el crédito solicitado comprará mas plantas de palto ya que tiene previsto injertarlos a medida que van desarrollándose. Su plan a futuro es invertir sus ingresos en otro tipo de negocios como crianza de ovinos. Este es será su primer crédito y esta muy contenta de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero y esta dispuesta a cumplir puntualmente con el rol de sus cronogramas de pago. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles solicitados comprara mas plantas de palto para posteriormente injertarlos y sacar provecho de los frutos en corto tiempo.
texts.en:
Maura is 34 years old.  She is a native of the city of Santa Rosa, and is a hard-working woman.  She lives in her own home with her partner Efraín, aged 35, and their three beloved children, for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.

Maura emphasizes that everything she has accomplished has been due to her tenacity and the care she gives to her crops of cocoa, coffee and avocados.  She tries to give her plantations the best care possible, and as a result of that premise, many of her buyers have been been satisfied by the quality of the products she harvests.  Nonetheless, she tries to do more on a daily basis, and dedicates a good amount of time to her crops.  While she also has the support of her partner in her work, when it comes to harvest time it is necessary for her to hire workers to speed up the harvesting and haulage of her products.  The fruit of her daily efforts is that she earns a good income.

With the requested loan, Mercedes will buy more avocado plants, as she has plans for grafting them as they grow.  

Her plan for the future is to invest her income in another type of business, such as raising sheep.

This will be her first loan, and she is very happy to know that she can count on the financial support.  She is ready to comply punctually with her repayment schedule.  With the 1,500 New Soles requested, she will buy more avocado plants for grafting at a later point, and will make a profit from the fruit in a short time-period.

loans.use: to buy more avocado plants.

loans.name: Glorios

texts.en: Glorios is 32 years old and has two children aged eighteen and two. The eldest is in school. Glorios and her husband have been selling building materials, such as bricks and stones, for two years. Glorios needs a loan in order to buy a piece of land from which she can extract more stones to sell. She will reinvest the money in her business.

loans.use: to buy building materials for resale.

loans.name: Khalila

texts.en:
Khalila is a divorced woman with three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.
For the past year, Khalila has operated an ice cube and fresh water sales business, selling from home to her neighboring community members. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her business. 
With this loan of 80,000 KES, she wants to purchase a freezer for storing ice cubes and establish a charcoal sales stall. She decided to join Kiva partner, Yehu, to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer for storing ice cubes and establish a charcoal sales stall.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 42 years old and has three children between the ages of three and thirteen. The eldest two children are in school. Jacqueline's husband is a technician at RwandaTech. 
Jacqueline rents out traditional wedding clothes. She has been running this business for the last two years. She needs a loan to buy more traditional clothes for rental. Jacqueline will use the profits to continue to expand her business and begin selling decorations for weddings and events.

loans.use: to purchase traditional wedding clothes to rent out at her store.

loans.name: Madres Laboriosas Group

texts.es: La Sra  Mirtha es conviviente, tiene 3  hijos, Mirtha  tiene 56  años D. edad  actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Madres Laboriosas” grupo  conformado por  8 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Mirtha  trabaja  desD. hace 5 años en la venta D. productos Omnilife, son productos que tienen vitaminas y nos dan energía, Mirtha venD. sus productos a domicilio, este negocio surge porque sus hijos ya estaban grandes y casados es asi que ella quería su independencia económica y sentirse realizada como mujer, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, ha comprado cosas para su hogar  y junto a su esposo viven feliz,  con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería para seguir vendiendo. Sabemos que Mirtha  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran
texts.en:
Señor Mirtha is in a live-in relationship, and has three children.  Mirtha is 56 years old, and is currently a member of the "Madres Laboriosas" ("Busy Mothers") communal bank.  The group is maD. of eight members who work in different business activities.

Mirtha has been working for the last 5 years selling Omnilife products.  These are products that contain vitamins, and proviD. us with energy.  Mirtha sells her products from her home.  This business came about because her children were already grown and married, and so she wanted her financial independence and to feel fully realized as a woman.  Thanks to her efforts and dedication, she has achieved significant financial income, and has purchased items for her home.  She and her husband live happily, and with the goal of continuing to grow, she has requested a new loan to buy merchandise that she will continue to sell.  We know that Mirtha will accomplish her goals with much hard work and effort, and that the loans from Edaprospo will help her in this.

loans.use: to buy Omnilife merchandise.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
Magdalena nació en el departamento del Cusco al sur del Perú. Actualmente, Magdalena tiene 51 años de edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos. 

Actualmente, Magdalena vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella desde hace 20 años que se dedica a la costura. En esta oportunidad Magdalena requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de la maquinas de coser. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de las Nieves” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Magdalena was born in the Department of Cusco, in the South of Peru.  Currently, Magdalena is 51 years old and married; the fruit of this marriage are her four children.

Magdalena lives today in the city where she was born, and where she works.  For the last 20 years she has worked in sewing.  On this occasion, Magdalena is requesting the loan to do maintenance on her sewing machines.

The "Virgen de las Nieves" Communal Bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (in Peru).  Cusco is well-known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and also because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her sewing machines.

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Roció nació en el departamento del Cusco al sur del Perú. Actualmente, Rocio tiene 34 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. 

Actualmente, Roció vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella se dedica a la venta de artesanía como por ejemplo  chompas y mantas de alpaca. En esta oportunidad Roció requiere el préstamo para comprar lana de alpaca.

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de las Nieves” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Rocio was born in the Cusco Region in southern Peru.  She is now 34 years old, married, and has three children.

Rocio currently lives in the city where she was born and where she is developing her business.  She sells handicrafts, such as sweaters and blankets made of alpaca wool.  At the moment Rocio needs this loan to buy alpaca wool.

The Virgen de las Nieves Communal Bank meets every 30th in Cusco, Peru.  Cusco is known for being a very tourist-friendly, commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi celebration and because one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu, is found here.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool

loans.name: Julissa

texts.es:
Julissa nació en el departamento del Cusco al sur del Perú. Actualmente, Julissa tiene 35 años de edad, es soltera y aun no tiene hijos.

Actualmente, Julissa vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella trabaja como empleada del hogar. En esta oportunidad Julissa requiere el préstamo para construir su casa. 

El Banco Comunal “Virgen de las Nieves” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Julissa was born in the Department of Cusco, in the South of Peru. Currently, Julissa is 35 years old.  She is single, and has no children as of yet.

Julissa lives today in the city where she was born, and this is where she works. She works as a housekeeper. On this occasion, Julissa is requesting the loan to build a house for herself.

The "Virgen de las Nieves" Communal Bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (in Peru). Cusco is well-known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and also because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to build a house for herself.

loans.name: Severo

texts.es: El señor Severo, se dedica a la producción de leche y su esposa lo colabora con las actividades agrícolas. El crédito lo requiere para la comprar un par de vacas lecheras para incrementar su producción de leche que vende  ala Planta Industrializadora de leche PIL y mejorar sus ingresos. Vive en casa propia ubicado en la localidad de Achacachi  del departamento de La Paz;  es casado y tiene tres hijos. Severo es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2007; esta será la segunda vez que se recurre a los financiadotes de Kiva para fondear el préstamo.
texts.en: Severo is a dairy farmer and his wife helps out with the farming chores.  He needs the loan to buy a pair of dairy cows to increase milk production to sell to the PIL milk processing plant and improve his income.  He lives in his own house located in Achacachi, La Paz Department.  He’s married and has three children.  Severo has been an IMPRO client since 2007 and this will be the second time he calls upon Kiva lenders to fund his loan.

loans.use: to buy a pair of dairy cows.

loans.name: Arvera

texts.en:
Arvera is 34 years old and has 2 children aged 14 and 17, and are both in school. She sells different types of foodstuffs like peanuts, sunflower oil and small fish. She buys them from neighboring countries and sells them in Rwanda. 

She has run this business for the last 14 years. She needs a loan to purchase more foodstuffs to sell in her store. She will use the profits along with her savings to buy a house.

loans.use: to purchase food to sell in her store

loans.name: Simona

texts.es: La señora Simona, es comerciante de ají y viaja por todo el pais dos veces al mes comprando y vendiendo el producto; su esposo es chofer y también tiene un equipo de amplificación con el cual presta servicios de DJ en acontecimientos sociales. El crédito lo solicita para incrementar el capital de  trabajo y comprar mayor cantidad de ají, pues es un producto que ella comercializa exitosamente. Simona vive en casa alquiler ubicado en la zona de Villa Esperanza en  la ciudad de El Alto;  es casada y tiene tres hijos. Simona tiene una relación con IMPRO desde el año 2006 y los créditos le han ayudado muchisimo en mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su familia. Esta es la segunda vez que su préstamo es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Simona is a chili pepper merchant.  She travels throughout the country twice a month buying and selling this product.  Her husband is a driver and also has a sound system that he uses to provide DJ services at social events.  She’s asking for the loan to increase capital to buy a larger amount of chili pepper because it’s a product that she sells quite successfully.  

Simona lives in a rented house located in the city of El Alto’s Villa Esperanza zone.  She’s married and has three children.  Simona has had a relationship with IMPRO since 2006 and the loans have helped her immensely to improve her and her family’s quality of life.  This is the second time her loan is channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy chili pepper at wholesale.

loans.name: Enagnon Group

texts.fr: ENAGNON est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, Georgette Kagnidé (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 31 ans et vit au Bénin. Georgette Kagnidé est célibataire sans enfant. Georgette Kagnidé a très peu fréquenté l'école. Pour subvenir à ses  besoins, Georgette Kagnidé mène comme activité la vente des tissus et des bijoux. A côté de cette activité, Georgette Kagnidé vend du riz et de l'huile de palme. Georgette Kagnidé s’approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. C’est la troisième fois que Georgette Kagnidé et les autres membres du groupe ENAGNON sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur fonds de roulement et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. Les deux premiers crédits reçus ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The ENAGNON group consists of three persons living in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group, Georgette Kagnidé (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 31 years old and lives in Benin. She is single with no children, and has had little formal schooling.

To support herself, Georgette Kagnidé sells fabrics and jewelry. Alongside this activity, she sells rice and palm oil. She buys her supplies in one of Benin's markets. This is the third time that Georgette Kagnidé and the other ENAGNON group members seek financial support from ALIDé to strengthen their working capital and to better meet the needs of their customers. The first two loans they received have been repaid in full.

loans.use: Buy clothing fabrics, jewelry, and palm oil

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es: El señor Edgar, tiene un gimnasio y también es profesor en una escuela de La Paz. El crédito lo requiere para  comprar tres bicicletas estáticas para gimnasio, equipo multifuncional para gimnasio y un equipo de sonido para aerobics; de esta manera ofrecerá mejores servicios en el gimnasio de su propiedad. Edgar vive en casa de un familiar  la misma queda  ubicada en la zona Bajo San Antonio de la ciudad de La Paz; es divorciado y   tiene cuatro  hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un credito esperando crecer como microempresario y mejorar sus ingresos para ayudar a la educación y bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Edgar has a gym and he’s also a teacher at a school in La Paz.  He needs the loan to buy three stationary bicycles for the gym, multifunctional equipment for the gym and a sound system for aerobics.  This will help him provide better service at the gym he owns.

Edgar lives in a family member’s house located in the city of La Paz’s Bajo San Antonio zone.  He’s divorced and has four children.  This is the first time the client has obtained a loan and he hopes to grow as a micro businessman and to improve his income to help with his children’s education and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy cycling and other equipment for his gym.

loans.name: Nicasia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; El banco pertenece al distrito D. Tica Tica, Provincia D. Cusco, departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nicasia; La socia tiene 59 años D. edad, la socia es casada y tiene 2 hijos, La socia tiene su propio negocio, ella se dedica  a la compra y venta D. golosinas, la socia tiene su puesto ambulatorio D. venta D. golosinas en el colegio Civirichi, la socia requiere el crédito para invertir en la compra D. caramelos, chupetines, galletas, entre otros al por mayor y lo venD. D. forma independiente, la socia desea a futuro poder terminar D. construir su vivienda para tener la satisfacción D. que sus hijos tendrán un hogar propio y seguro, entonces ellos no se ocuparan D. la casa si no D. ellos mismo y sus estudios. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra D. golosinas al por mayor.
La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”. The bank is located in the district of Tica Tica, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco.

The member is Senora Nicasia. The member is 59 years old, married and has 2 children. She buys and sells sweets. The member has a street stall selling sweets in the Civirichi college. The member needs the loan to invest in the purchase of candy, lollipops and cookies and other such items wholesale to sell independently. The member wants in the future to finish building her house so as to have the satisfaction of giving her children a safe home of their own, so that they are not worrying about the house but concentrating on themselves and their studies. The member is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of candy wholesale.

The member is very satisfied and grateful for the support that will be given her through the communal bank and is committed to making her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy sweets wholesale.

loans.name: Belisario

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al Banco Comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Tica Tica, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.
El socio es invitado del grupo, el Sr. Belisario; el socio lleva en este banco más de 3 ciclos y al igual que él fue invitado por ser esposo de una de las socia fueron invitados 3 caballeros mas a unirse a este simpático grupo; el socio tiene 28 años de edad, el socio es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 3 años de edad; el socio es conductor él tiene su propia unidad vehicular, el socio trabaja prestando el servicio de taxi, el socio desea el crédito para reparar su automóvil que está un poco mal le está fallando el motor, así que lo hará reparar todo el sistema, el socio desea comprar un futuro no muy lejano un nuevo automóvil. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la reparación del motor de su vehículo.
El socio se muestra muy satisfecho y agradecido por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MADRES TRABAJADORAS” Communal Bank ("The Hard-Working Mothers").  This bank is located in the district of Tica Tica, in Cusco Province, in Cusco Department.

This member, Señor Belisario, was invited into the group.  He has been in this bank for more than three lending cycles; he was invited into it as the husband of one of the members, as they invited three men to join with them in this friendly group.

The member is 28 years old, and has a live-in relationship; he has two children aged 9 and 3.  The member is a driver; he has his own vehicle.  He works providing taxi service.  The member is looking for the loan to repair his car, which is not in good shape as the motor is failing.  As the whole system needs repairing, the member would like to buy a new car in the not too distant future.  The member is requesting this loan to invest in repairing his motor vehicle.

The member show great satisfaction and gratitude for the support that is being offered him by this means, and commits to complying with the repayment of his liabilities at the established location.

loans.use: to repair his car's motor.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Tica Tica, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yanett; la socia tiene 31 años de edad, ella es casada, la socia tiene 1 hijo; la socia se dedica a la artesanía, ella compra y vende artesanía hace un año atrás está  exportando artesanía al extranjero pero en un mínimo porcentaje, la socia desearía poder incrementar sus ganancias si solo pudiera exportar a futuro cercano un mayor número de arte para el extranjero,  la socia dice que esto se debe a que muchos turistas no la encuentran en la página principal en internet y por ello le es mas difícil competir, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de arte al por mayor y de materiales  para la realización de trabajos propios, la socia desearía exportar al mayoreo, lo que quiere decir crecer en ventas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un grupo de arte para decorar los diferentes espacios familiares.
La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Madres Trabajadoras communal bank, located in the Tica Tica district in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Yanet, 31, is married and has one child.  She works in crafts, buying and selling crafts.  For a year she has been exporting crafts abroad, but only a very small percentage.  She would like to be able to increase her profits in the near future, if only she could export a greater number of pieces.  She says this is because many tourists don't find her on the home page on the internet, and this is why it's more difficult for her to compete.

She wants to use the loan to buy art wholesale and supplies for her own work.  She would like to export wholesale, which means to increase her sales.  She is requesting the loan to buy a set of artworks for decorating different parts of the home.

Yanet is satisfied and grateful for the support that this loan will offer her, and she is committed to repaying her debt by the established deadline.

loans.use: to buy a set of artworks for decorating different parts of the home.

loans.name: Cleofe

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Tica Tica, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cleofe;  la socia tiene 38 años de edad la socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 4 años de edad, la socia se dedica la compra y venta de ropa de manera independiente ella solo reparte a sus amistades y amigos cercanos y en algunas instituciones por medio de algún contacto, la socia desea invertir el crédito e la compra de ropa para damas y caballeros al por mayor la socia compraría chompas de cuello largo, polos, pantalones, camisas, vestidos y algunas casacas, La socia desearía tener una galería de ropa en un futuro cercano. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa al por mayor para la venta.
La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Communal Bank “MADRES TRABAJADORAS” ("The Hard-Working Mothers").  The bank is located in Tica Tica district, in Cusco Province in Cusco Department.

This member is Señor Cleofe.  She is 38 years old, and lives with her partner and 2 children aged 7 and 4.  The member works for herself, buying and selling clothes.  She sells only to nearby friends and acquaintances, and to several companies by means of her contacts.

The member wants to invest the loan in the purchase of women's and men's clothing at wholesale.  The member will buy high-necked sweaters, polo-shirts, trousers, blouses, dresses, and some jackets.  The member would like to have a clothing store in the near future.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of clothing at wholesale, which she will resell.

The member shows great satisfaction and appreciation for the support that is being offered to her through this means, and agrees to comply with the payment of her liabilities at the established location.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of clothing at wholesale, which she will resell.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “MADRES TRABAJADORAS”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Tica Tica, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Saturnina; La socia tiene 56 años de edad, la socia es soltera y tiene 3 hijos de 26, 24, 21 años de edad, la socia se dedica  a la costura, la socia tiene un pequeño taller de costura acomodado en su casa, la socia realiza vestidos, camisas, trajes de fiesta, formales , jeans, faldas entre otras prendas, la socia con el crédito desea comprar telas, hilos, botones, reglas de costura y poder crear algunos diseños que tiene en mente, la socia a futuro no muy lejano le gustaría  implementar mejor su taller de costura. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cierres y reglas de costura. 

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Madres Trabajadoras" (Working Mothers).  The bank is in the Tica Tica Distrcit of Cusco Province, Cusco Department.

The member is Sra. Saturnina.  She is 56 years old, is single and has three children who are 26, 24 and 21 years old.  She makes her living as a seamstress.  The member has a small sewing workshop in her home.  She makes dresses, shirts, party suits, formal wear, jeans and skirts, among other garments.  The member needs the loan to purchase cloth, thread, buttons and cloth measuring tapes and to be able to create some designs that she has in mind.  In the near future, the member would like to implement some improvements to her sewing workshop.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of cloth, thread, buttons, zippers and cloth measuring tapes.

The member is very satisfied with and thankful for the support she will be given through this loan, and she promises to comply with the established repayment plan.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of fabric, thread, buttons, zippers and cloth measuring tapes.

loans.name: Erick

texts.es: Erick tiene 23 años, es un joven muy trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su querido hijo Dayron de 05 años; a quien le inculca aferrarse al estudio. Erick a su corta edad es un joven centrado en sus responsabilices y obligaciones, la vida le enseñó tropiezos pero no se amilana. Hoy trata de sobresalir cultivando plantas de cacao, café y frutas cítricas, los cuales después de cosecharlos los lleva a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, en donde ya tiene diversos compradores, que sabiendo de la calidad de su producto no dudan en esperarlo para comprarle todos lo cosechado. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva 06 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus chacras, ya que tiene que hacerlo con mucho cuidado por que los productos químicos no perjudiquen su salud. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos por que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este es su segundo cedito con MFP  y pro tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes ya que sabe que el dinero obtenido le será muy beneficioso en el progreso de su labor y se siente contento por pertenecer al grupo de socios de su banco comunal. Con el dinero solicitado, contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en el mantenimiento respectivo de sus cultivos como: la poda, el desmonte y la fumigación.
texts.en: Erick is 23 years old.  He is a very hard working young man who lives in his own home with his dear, 5-year old son, Dayron.  He instills in his son the importance of education.  Even at his young age, Erick is focused on his responsibilities and obligations.  Life has given him obstacles, but he is undaunted.  Today he tries to excel at growing cacao, coffee and citrus fruits.  After harvesting his plants, he brings them to the city of San Francisco to sell.  In San Fransisco, he has various purchasers who are familiar with the quality of his products and are always sure to wait for him to purchase his whole crop.  What Erick likes most about his work is planting his fields and making them fertile and productive.  He has been in this line of work for 6 years and feels that the most difficult part is spraying his parcels of land, which is something he must do very carefully so that the chemicals don't damage his health.  In the future, he hopes to keep saving his earnings so he can purchase additional land.  This is Erick's second loan with MFP, and he hopes each one of you can help him, as he knows the money he will be loaned will be very beneficial in the progress of his labor.  He is happy to a part of the group of members that make up his communal bank.  With the requested money, Erick will contract day laborers to help him maintain his crops: pruning, clearing and spraying.

loans.use: to contract day laborers.

loans.name: Giuliana

texts.es:
Giuliana nació en el departamento del Cusco al sur del Perú. Actualmente, Giuliana tiene 29 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos. 

Actualmente, Giuliana vive en la ciudad donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella es ama de casa pero ayuda a su esposo Álvaro en el taller mecánico en el área administrativa.

En esta oportunidad Giuliana requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo pistones, empaques, grasa y muchas cosas más. 

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Giuliana was born in Cusco Department in the south of Perú.  Currently, Giuliana is 29 years old, is married and fruit of this beautiful relationship has two children. 

Giuliana currently lives in the city where she was born and where she works.  She is a house-wife but also helps her husband, Álvaro, in his mechanic's workshop.  She works in administration.

At this time, Giuliana needs the loan to purchase materials like pistons, washers, grease and many other things.

The communal bank “Comuzone IV” meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being a tourist and commercial area and also for the traditional festival of Inti Raymi.  Cusco is known as well for being home to one of the Seven Wonders of the World, “Machupicchu”.

loans.use: to purchase materials like pistons, washers, grease and many other things.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es:
Mariana nació en la ciudad de Sicuani (Cusco, Perú). Actualmente, Mariana tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos. 

Desde hace 25 años que Mariana radica en la ciudad del Cusco y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella tiene un horno donde su labor es organizar y controlar el trabajo de sus ayudantes. En el Horno se prepara diferentes tipos de pasteles y panes. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Mariana requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo esencias, harina, azúcar y levadura. 

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Mariana was born in the city of Sicuani (Cusco, Perú).  Currently, Mariana is 49 years old, is married and fruit of this beautiful relationship has three children.

Twenty-five years ago, Mariana settled in the city of Cusco, which is where she works.  She owns a bakery and her work there is to organize and supervise her helpers' work.  In the bakery, they prepare different types of pastries and bread.  She has been making her living with this business for three years now, and it has been going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  At this time, Mariana needs the loan to purchase supplies such as essences, flour, sugar and yeast.

The communal bank “Comuzone IV” meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being a tourist and commercial area as well as for the traditional festival of Inti Raymi.  Cusco is also known for being home to one of the Seven Wonders of the World, "Machupicchu”.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as essences, flour, sugar and yeast.

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es:
María Salome nació en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Actualmente, Maria Salome tiene 38 años de edad, tiene una relación de libre unión de la cual tiene dos hijos. 

Desde hace 20 años que María Salome radica en la ciudad del Cusco y donde desarrolla sus actividades, ella se dedica a elaboración y venta de artesanía en una de las ferias de venta de artesanía en la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son tres años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad María Salome requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo pines, piñones, orejeras y otras cosas más. Su sueño de María Salome es abrir una tienda de venta y exportar sus productos.   

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
María Salome was born in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Perú).  Currently, Maria Salome is 38 years old and lives with her partner, with whom she has two children. 

Twenty years ago, María Salome settled in the city of Cusco, which is where she works.  She makes her living making and selling handicrafts in one of the craft markets in Cusco.  She has been making her living with this business for three years now, and it has been going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  At this time, María Salome needs the loan to purchase materials such as pins, pine nuts, ear flaps and many other things.  María Salome's dream is to open a retail store and export her products. 

The communal bank “Comuzone IV” meets every thirty days in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being both a tourist and a commercial area and also for the traditional festival of Inti Raymi.  Cusco is known as well for being home to one of the Seven Wonders of the World, “Machupicchu”.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as pins, pine nuts, ear flaps and many other things.

loans.name: Benita

texts.es:
Benita nació en la ciudad D. Yanahoca (provincia D. Urubamba, departamento del Cusco). Actualmente, Benita tiene 65 años D. edad, es casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene cinco hijos. 

DesD. hace 7 años que Benita radica en la ciudad del Cusco y donD. desarrolla sus actividades, ella se dedica a elaboración D. chicha D. jora y a la venta D. comida, ella también tiene una segunda actividad económica que es la crianza D. animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, pollos y gallinas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Benita requiere el préstamo para comprar más cuyes y pollos.

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Benita was born in the city of Yanahoca (which is in Urubamba Province, in Cusco Department).  Benita is 65 years old and is married; the fruits of this relationship are her five children.

For the last seven years, Benita has resided in the city of Cusco, and this is where she works.  She works making "chicha D. jora" (a traditional corn liquor) and selling meals.  She also has a second economic activity raising small animals, for example guinea pigs, chickens and hens.  She has been doing this for several years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the persistence she brings to her work.

On this occasion, Benita is requesting the loan to buy more guinea pigs and chickens.

The "Comuzone IV" Communal Bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (in Peru).  Cusco is well-known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi, and also because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria Elena nació en el departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, María Elena tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. 

Maria Elena es abogada y desde hace 13 años que ejerce su profesión y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Maria Elena requiere el préstamo para implementar su oficina. Su Sueño de Maria Elena es sacar profesionales a sus hijos.  

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Maria Elena was born in Cusco department.  She is 40 years old, married, and has three children from her marriage.

Maria Elena is a lawyer.  She has been working in her profession for 13 years and is doing very well.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to equip her office.  Her dream is to see her children become professionals.

The 'Comuzone IV' community bank meets once a month in the city of Cusco (Peru).  Cusco is well known for being a very touristy, commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi fiesta and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world (Machu Picchu).

loans.use: to equip her law office

loans.name: Luz Dina

texts.es:
Luz Dina nació en el departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, Luz Dina tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. 

Luz Dina se dedica a brindar servicio de turismo vivencial en su casa de campo en la comunidad de Caicay de la provincia de Paucartambo. La comunidad de Caicay se encuentra ubicado a 35 km de la ciudad del Cusco. Ya son 8 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Luz Dina requiere el préstamo para implementar la casa de campo.  

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Luz Dina was born in Cusco department.  She is 40 years old, married, and has three children from her marriage.

Luz Dina provides a home-stay tourism service in her country house which is located in Caicay community, in Paucartambo province.  The community of Caicay is located 35km from the city of Cusco.  She has been in this business for 8 years and it is doing very well.  On this occasion, Luz Dina needs a loan to equip her country house.

The 'Comuzone IV' community bank meet once a month in the city of Cusco (Peru).  Cusco is well known for being a touristy, commercial area.  It is also known for its traditional Inti Raymi fiesta and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world (Machu Picchu).

loans.use: to equip her house in the country

loans.name: Marlim

texts.es: Marlim, natural de la ciudad de Santa Rosa, tiene 35 años, es una mujer sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Jorge y su querida hija Jenifer de 10 años, a quien desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Marlim y su pareja son el sustento de su familia. Ella desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra,es así que posee su propia parcela donde cultiva café, cacao y achiote. Tiene 17 años trabajando en sus propias tierras, y lo que más le gusta es recolectar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en las ciudades de Santa Rosa y san francisco, lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. Su dificultad es no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo quitanto la maleza que crece entre sus plantaciones. Es por ello que acude a los créditos que facilita la institución MFP, pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de café por que es una de las plantas con mayor demanda en los mercados. Este es será su segundo crédito  y  ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos anteriores y espera beneficiarse una vez más para pregresar en su negocio. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en  el desmonte de maleza.
texts.en:
Marlim, a native of the city of Santa Rosa, is 35 years old and is a sincere, hardworking woman. She lives in her own house with her husband, Jorge, and her dear daughter, Jennifer, 10, for whom she wishes to provide a better quality of life. She and her partner support the family. 

Ever since she was very young, Marlim’s parents taught her how to work in the fields. Thus she owns her own parcel where she cultivates coffee, cacao and annatto. She has been working her own land for 17 years and what she most enjoys is gathering the fruit from her plants because she feels that the months of arduous work have produced the reward of a high quality yield. The most difficult aspect of her work is transporting her crop from the field to the collection centers located in the cities of Santa Rosa and San Francisco, places that offer the best prices for her products.

Marlim’s other difficulty is that she does not have sufficient income to pay in advance the day laborers who provide help removing the weeds that grow in her fields. This is the reason she has taken out loans from MFP, however now her priority is to cultivate more coffee because it is one of the plants in greatest demand on the market. This will be her second loan and she has been very punctual in making her earlier payments. She hopes to benefit one more time in order to grow her business. This loan of 2,000 nuevos soles will enable her to hire day laborers to help her with the weeding.

loans.use: to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Doña Juana tiene 45 años está viviendo en unión libre con su pareja Francisco el cual trabaja en el campo, juntos han procreado cuatro los cuales todos dependen de dicha pareja todavía ya que todos están estudiando en diferentes niveles empezando por la secundaria hasta primaria, el más grande tiene 16 años y el más pequeño 11 años.
La señora Juana tiene una tienda de abarrotes solo el nombre es por "Miscelánea" en el negocio tiene 5 años de experiencia, ahora solicita el crédito para abastecer su tienda comprando huevo, pan , refrescos, productos entados, detergente, aceite, leche y golosinas. El problema que presenta ahora es que no tiene para abastecer su tienda y casi no tiene mercancía por eso es que está solicitando el crédito. Sus metas son hacer crecer su negocio para meter más ganancia ya que el lugar que tiene es muy pequeño y apenas cabe para tener un refrigerador. “Gracias por el crédito que me han otorgado, voy a echarle muchas ganas para no quedar mal con ustedes”
texts.en:
Doña Juana is 45 years old and lives in a common law relationship with her partner Francisco, who works on a farm.  Together they have four children, who are all still dependent on them, as all four are in different grades in school from elementary to high school.  Their oldest is 16 years old and the youngest is 11.  

Señora Juana has a grocery store this is just called "Miscelánea" [Miscellaneous].  She has 5 years of experience in this business.  She is requesting a loan to stock her store by purchasing eggs, bread, soft drinks, canned goods, detergent, oil, milk, and sweets.  The problem she is having that she doesn't have enough to stock her store and she has very little merchandise.  For this reason she is requesting a loan.  Her goals are to grow her business to increase her income since her location is very small and barely fits a refrigerator.  

"Thank you for the loan you have given me.  I am going to try very hard to remain in good-standing with you."

loans.use: purchase eggs, bread, soft drinks, canned goods, detergent, oil, milk, and sweets.

loans.name: Segundo Nicolás

texts.es:
En la cordillera de "Los Andes" en la región central del Ecuador se encuentra "Latacunga", la capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi la cual se encuentra a 2850 metros a nivel del mar. Tiene un clima promedio de 12 grados centígrados. Este cantón es muy conocido por su colorida fiesta de "La mama negra"  que se celebra por su independencia. 
Segundo es un hombre de 57 años quien vive junto a su esposa Rosa y un hijo menor de edad en el barrio "La Calera" del cantón Latacunga.
Hace 8 años perdió su empleo y esto lo obligó a dedicarse a la compra y venta de chatarra. El hace gustoso este trabajo ya que nos  comenta le agrada aportar al cuidado del medio ambiente. Trabaja diez horas al día con su camioneta, el obstáculo que ha tenido en su vida es no haber tenido una educación formal ya que únicamente ha cursado la primaria. Segundo solicitó a Fundación Alternativa un crédito que le permita comprar una buena cantidad de chatarra y así poder revenderla y obtener mayores ingresos. De esta manera el piensa darle un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Latacunga, in the cordillera of the Andes in central Ecuador, is the capital of the province of Cotopaxi, located 2850 meters above sea level.  The average temperature is 12 degrees Celsius.  This canton is very well known for its colorful La Mama Negra festival to celebrate independence.

Segunda is 57 years old and lives with his wife, Rosa, and a minor child in the La Calera neighborhood of Latacunga Canton.  Eight years ago he lost his job, which forced him to work in buying and selling scrap.  He thinks this job is agreeable, since he told us that he likes to contribute to caring for the environment.  He works ten hours a day with his truck.  The obstacle he has had in his life is not having a formal education, since he only attended elementary school.

Segundo requested a loan from Fundación Alternativa that will allow him to buy a good quantity of scrap so he can resell it to get higher earnings.  In this way he plans to give his family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy scrap and sell it.

loans.name: Mana

texts.fr:
Mana est une femme âgée de 35 ans. Elle est célibataire avec un enfant de 20 ans qui n’est pas scolarisé.  
Mana travaille comme revendeuse de cartes de rechange depuis l’an 2000. Elle sert tous les clients dans l’enceinte du Centre Médicaux Social d’Agoé. Elle achète les produits dans les agences de télécommunication du Togo. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la concurrence rude sur le marché. 
Mana a requis son cinquième cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des cartes de recharge. Elle veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Mana voudrait pérenniser son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit construire une famille heureuse.
texts.en:
Mana is a 35-year-old woman. She is single with a 20-year-old child who has not had schooling.
Mana has been working as a retailer of phone recharge cards since 2000. She serves all her customers inside the Medical Social Center of Agoè. She gets her products from the telecommunication agencies of Togo. She works alone.

At this time her main problem is the tough competition in the marketplace. Mana has requested her fifth loan cycle from WAGES to purchase recharge cards. She wants to reinvest her profits into her business activity.
In coming years, Mana would like to carry on her business. She says that with the profits earned, she plans on establishing a happy family.

loans.use: buy phone recharge cards

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela tiene 22 años ella está casada desde hace 4 años con el señor Gabino el cual trabaja en la obra juntos han procreado 2 niños uno de 3 años y otro de 2 años aunque todavía no van a la escuela si dependen de dicho matrimonio. 
Ella invertirá el crédito para comprar 4 borregos, pastura el cual lo compra por kilo y alimento que lo compra por bulto, ella en la actividad ganadera lleva 4 años lo aprendió de su papa compra y vende sus borregos los vende cuando ya están grandes, las esperanzas que tiene la señora Daniela es que sus borregas crezcan y den borreguitos para que su sean más borregos y así sus ganancias aumenten. 
Ella está muy agradecida por el préstamo  porque podrá comprarse otros borregos que ya le hacían falta en su corral.
texts.en:
Daniela is 22 years old.  She has been married to Señor Gabino for the last four years; he works in construction.  They have two children together, one aged 3 and the other aged 2.  They are not yet at school, and so are dependent on their parents.

She will invest this loan to buy four sheep; grass which she buys for them by the kilo; and feed which she buys for them by the bundle.  She has spent four years working with livestock.  She learned from her dad to buy and sell sheep, selling them once they have become large. 

Señora Daniela's hopes are that her sheep grow and give her lambs so that she has more sheep, and so can increase her earnings.

She is very grateful for the loan, because she will be able to buy additional sheep which she currently needs for her farm.

loans.use: to buy four sheep, grass and feed.

loans.name: Ma. Rosario

texts.es:
María Rosario tiene 57 años está casada con el señor Gregorio desde hace 42 años, don Gregorio esta enfermo de las costillas por lo mismo no puede trabajar ya no tiene hijos que dependan de ellos solo tuvieron dos hijos pero ya se casaron y viven aparte.
La señora Rosario tiene una tienda de abarrotes desde hace tres años donde invertirá el crédito comprando, pan, leche, huevo, refresco, agua, golosinas, productos enlatados, en general comprara productos que en su comunidad la gente necesita que sería todo tipo de comida.
La esperanza que tiene doña Rosario es que su negocio crezca porque necesita las ganancias para el tratamiento de su esposo. Ya que es por el problema que se le está presentando en estos momentos. “muchas gracias por el crédito porque me ayudara de mucho sobre todo para abastecer la tienda que se estaba quedando sin mercancía.”
texts.en:
María Rosario is 57 years old.  She has been married to Gregorio for 42 years.  Gregorio has a problem with his ribs and so cannot work.  They no longer have any children who are dependent on them.  They only had two children and they are now married and live in their own homes.

Rosario has had a grocery store for three years.  She will invest her loan in her store, buying bread, milk, eggs, soft drinks, water, candies and canned goods.  She will buy products that people in her community need which is all kinds of food.  Rosario's hope is that her business will grow because she needs the profits for her husband's treatment for the problem that he has right now.  "Thank you very much for the loan.  It will help me a lot, especially in stocking my store which was running out of merchandise".

loans.use: to buy milk, bread, sugar, oil, soft drinks and canned goods

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
El señor Jorge tiene 47 años de edad está casado desde hace 29 años con su esposa Martha juntos procrearon 7 hijos aun 4 de ellos de penden de dicha pareja 2 niñas y dos niños, una niña de 13 años, una 6 años, un niño de 10 años y el más pequeño que tiene 4 años es el único que no estudia todavía los otros tres sí. El se dedica a la actividad ganadera ya que desde hace 22 años se dedica a crianza y venta de borregos ahorita tiene 22  borregos en su corra pero piensa vender y si vende se quedara con casi nada así que solicita el crédito para poder comparase 10 borregos mas, no comprara nada de alimento dado que con las ganancias que saque de los borregos que venderá el por su parte de ahí comprara. Por el momento no tiene o no ha tenido ningún tipo de problema ya que solo cuando se enferman pero los lleva al veterinario a así se curan.
Su meta es que sus borregas crezcan para que las ganancias que salgan de ahí sean para solventar los gastos del hogar ya que le gustaría que sus hijos sean grandes profesionistas. “Gracias por el crédito ya que para mí es de gran ayuda y confianza que nos otorgan, voy  hacer crecer grandes mis borregos para no quedar mal con ustedes.”
texts.en:
Jorge, 47, has been married to his wife, Martha, for 29 years.  They have 7 children and four of them still depend on them, two girls and two boys.  A 13-year-old and a 6-year-old girl and a 10-year-old and the youngest, a 4-year-old boy who is the only one not yet in school; the other three are in school.

He has been raising livestock for the last 22 years.  He raises sheep to sell and he currently has 22 lambs in his corral but he plans to sell and if he sells them he’ll be left with practically none so he’s asking for a loan to buy ten more lambs.  He won’t buy any feed because he’ll use money he’ll get from the sale of the other lambs to buy the feed.  For the moment, he hasn’t had nor does he now have any problems because if they get sick he takes them to the veterinarian and they get well that way.

His goal is that his lambs grow so that profits will come from them to cover household expenses since he’d like it if his children became great professionals.  “Thanks for the loan because for me it’s of great help and the trust you place in us.  I am going to see to it that my lambs grow so as not to disappoint you.”

loans.use: to buy ten lambs.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es:
Don Armando tiene 28 años de edad está viviendo en unión libre desde hace un año con su pareja Aurora, por el momento solo tienen Una niña de 4 meses de edad por lo cual está muy contento con la llegada de su primera hija.
