El se dedica a la ganadería desde hace 15 años lo cual aprendió de su papa vio que re una muy buena inversión ya que la gente de sus comunidad compra borregos para matarlos en alguna fiesta que tengan en su familia. El solicita el crédito para comprar 3 borregos y medicamento para inyectarlos para que no se enfermen ahorita tiene 10 borregos en su corral, el problema que esta pasado es que no tiene dinero para desparasitar sus animales y cuando están así no crecen como debería ser. “Gracias por el apoyo ya que con el crédito otorgado comprare para comprar el desparasitar y hacer crecer mis borregas ya que mi meta es hacer mi casa para mi hija y mi esposa”
texts.en:
Armando is 28 and has been living with his partner, Aurora, for a year.  For the time being they have only one child, a four-month-old daughter.  He is very happy about the arrival of his first daughter.

He has worked for 15 years in ranching, which he learned from his father.  He saw that it was a good investment, since the people in his community buy sheep to kill for some festivity they have in their family.

He is requesting a loan to buy three sheep and medication to inject them so they don't get sick right now.  He has ten sheep in his corral.  The problem is that he doesn't have the money to deworm his animals, and when they are like that they don't grow the way they should.  "Thank you for the support, since with the loan I will buy deworming medicine and make my sheep grow.  My goal is to make a home for my daughter and my wife."

loans.use: to buy three sheep and deworming medicine.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
Abel  tiene 28 años está casado desde hace 9 años con la señora Angélica María juntos han procreado dos niñas una de 3 años, una de 2 años, y un niño de 1 año.
El se dedica a  la cría de borregos  y puercos en la actividad tiene 7 años de la cual lo aprendió de su papa, esta vez el solicita el préstamo para la compra de 5 borregos y  5 cerdos el lugar y del alimento para estos animales no se preocupa ya que ya lo tienen el problema por el cual esta atravesando en estos momentos, es que algunos de sus borregos están algo flacos el comenta que hace falta desparasitarlos para que crezcan normal y sobre todo para que no mueran. 
Su meta es salir adelante hacer crecer su negocio para que sus ganancias sean cada vez mejor y pueda darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa. 
El señor Abel deja un mensaje a la fundación “Yo doy gracias ya que me será de gran ayuda porque mi ganado crecerá con el préstamo que ustedes me están haciendo un favor de prestar”
texts.en:
Abel, 28, has been married to Angélica María for the last 9 years; they have two daughters who are 3 and 2 years old and a one-year-old son.

He raises sheep and pigs; he’s been in this line of work for 7 years having learned it from his father.  On this occasion he’s asking for a loan to buy five lambs and five pigs.  He isn’t concerned about a place for the animals or feed for them because those things he has.  What does concern him at this time is that some of his lambs are somewhat skinny and he comments that they need to be ridden of parasites so that they’ll grow normally and, above all, not die.

His goal is to get ahead, to make his business grow so that his profits will be higher each time and he can provide a better quality of life for his wife and children.

Abel leaves this message for the Fundación: “I give thanks because it will be a great help for me because my livestock will grow thanks to the loan that you are making possible for me to have.”

loans.use: to buy five lambs and five pigs.

loans.name: Sara

texts.es:
Doña Sara tiene un negocio de productos para uso personal, ella tiene 23 años, está casada con el señor Gregorio desde hace 3 años quien trabaja en el campo, hijos aun  no tienen.
 La señora Sara tiene un negocio que por el momento le hace falta mercancía nueva y llenarla para que sea atractiva para sus clientes, ella esta vez está solicitando el crédito para comprar ropa interior, artículos de belleza como (aretes, maquillaje, cortaúñas, espejos).
En esta actividad lleva tres años su puesto es ambulante ya que con un local  estable aun no cuenta, sin embargo tener un lugar fijo es una de sus metas llegar a poner un local donde también pieza poner un apartado donde venda zapatos.”Gracias por la confianza y el apoyo que me otorgan al prestarme el dinero.
texts.en:
Doña Sara has a business selling personal products.  She is 23 years old, and has been married for the last three years to Señor Gregorio, who works in the fields.  They don't have children as of yet.

Señora Sara has a business that right now needs new merchandise and to stock up so as to attract customers.  On this occasion, she is requesting  a loan to buy underwear and beauty articles such as earrings, makeup, nail-clippers and mirrors.

She has been doing this for three years.  She sells as a street vendor, as she doesn't have reliable premises.  Nevertheless, having a fixed location is one of her goals.  She would like to have premises where she can also dedicate a section to selling shoes.

She says, "Thank you for the trust and the support that you are providing me by lending me this money".

loans.use: to buy underwear, costume jewelry, nail-clippers, earrings, necklaces, bracelets, hairclips, brushes

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “PATRON SALVADOR DEL MUNDO”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Tica Tica, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mery; La socia tiene 40 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos de 15, 8, 7 meses de edad; la socia se dedica a la administración de sus pequeño negocio, ella tiene un centro de diversión para grandes y pequeños, la socia tiene un pim ball y también hay juegos en play station; la socia cada nuevo crédito invierte en la compra de un juego nuevo y la implementación de sus local, ella ha puesto vitrinas pequeñas con productos de snack para los clientes y venta de gaseosas y gelatinas, la socia en esta ocasión desea poder invertir el crédito en la compra de un play station, un mueble y en la compra de snack como papas fritas, tortis, gaseosas, aguas y para ello solicita el préstamo. La socia dice que su negocio esta empezando a ser muy rentable por lo que considerara ampliar en un futuro cercano el local e implementarlo de mejor manera para hacerlo más acogedor para sus pequeños clientes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de un juego de play station, y productos de snack y gaseosas.
  La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "PATRON SALVADOR DEL MUNDO” Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Tica Tica district, in Cusco Province and Cusco Department.

This member is Señor Mery; she is 40 years old.  She lives with her partner and has three children aged 15, 8, and 7 months.  The member works managing her small business; she has a entertainment venue for adults and kids where she has pinball and also PlayStation games.  The member invests each new loan in purchasing a new game, and setting it up in her premises.  She has small counters which sell snack products for her customers and also sodas and jell-o.  

On this occasion, the member wants to be able to invest her loan in buying a PlayStation game and a piece of furniture, and in buying snacks like french fries, tortillas, sodas, and water, and this is why she is requesting the loan.  The member says that her business is beginning to be very profitable, which is why she is considering expanding in future to nearby premises and setting up in a better manner to be more welcoming for her young customers.   The member is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of a PlayStation game, snack products and sodas.

The member shows that she is very satisfied and grateful for the support that is being provided to her through this means, and agrees to comply with the repayment of her liabilities in the established location.

loans.use: to buy a PlayStation game, snack products and sodas.

loans.name: Gabina

texts.es:
La Señora Gabina tiene 21 años está casada con el señor Erik desde hace 6 años trabaja en construcción de casas, tiene tres niños que aun no van a la escuela pero si depende de dicho matrimonio uno tiene 4 años, uno de 2 años y uno de 3 años
Doña Gabina cría borregos desde hace 2 años en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra 6 borregos en su corral quedan 5 borregos por ahora no tiene ninguna dificultad solo cuando les da un poco de gripe pero para esto se debe tener un lugar muy bien acondicionado para que esto no pase. Su meta es hacer crecer sus animalitos ya que quiere que sus ganancias sean mayores. “Gracias por el apoyo ya que me servirá para crecer y aumentar mis metas y proyectos de vida para mejorar su calidad de vida.”
texts.en:
Gabina, 21, has been married to Erik for six years.   He works building houses.  They have three children that don’t go to school yet but who do depend on this couple. One of them is 4 years old, one is 2 years old and one is 3 years old.

Gabina has been raising sheep for the last two years and on this occasion requests a loan to buy six lambs.  She has five sheep left in her corral that are currently problem free except when they catch a bit of cold.  One must have a proper, well-furnished place for them so that this does not happen.  Her goal is to have her little animals grow so that her profits will be larger.  “Thanks for the support that will help me grow and increase my goals and life projects to improve my quality of life.”

loans.use: to buy five lambs.

loans.name: Miryam

texts.es: Miryan, natural de la ciudad de Santa Rosa, tiene 23 años de edad, es una mujer soltera activa y trabajadora, vive en su propia vivienda y da de sí para sobresalir en la vida. Miryan a su corta ya es una mujer con mucha ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que trata con mucho cuidado la parcela que heredó de sus padres. Sus principales cultivos que realiza son: café y cacao, ella labra sus tierras con el apoyo de los jornaleros, quienes lo apoyan sacando la maleza, además de la cosecha y traslada los productos hasta la carretera para luego ser transportados con triciclos y/o carretillas. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene en el desempeño de su labor, ya que ella decide que es lo mejor para sus cultivos, lleva 05 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es combatir con la plaga de insectos que se apoderan de los brotes de los frutos. Ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que el dinero le será de mucha utilidad para el desarrollo de su trabajo. Se siente muy contenta por ser socia de su banco comunal y aportará de si misma para el desarrollo de su grupo. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles comprará machete y tijeras para injertar y podar sus plantas.
texts.en:
Miryan is a native of the city of Santa Rosa.  She’s 23 years old.  She’s a single, active and hardworking woman.  She lives in her own house and she makes the effort to get ahead in life.  At her young age, Miryan is a woman with a strong drive to get ahead and this is why she treats the land she inherited from her parents with such care.  

Her main crops are coffee and cocoa beans.  She tills the soil with help from day laborers who help her clear weeds in addition to harvesting.  The products are hauled to the highway to be picked up by three-wheeled vehicles and/or wheelbarrows.  What she most enjoys about her work is the freedom she has to do her work since she decides what’s best for her crops.  She’s been in this line of work for five years and considers the most difficult part having to combat the insects that infest her budding fruit.  Her main priority now is buying more land to increase crop yields.

This is her second MFP loan and she knows that the money will be very useful for her work’s development.  She feels very happy about being a member of a communal bank and she’ll put in her own efforts towards her group’s development.  She will use the 2000 new soles to buy machetes and shears to graft and prune her plants.

loans.use: to buy shears and machetes to prune her plants.

loans.name: Los Almendritos 1 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama los almendritos 1, los integrantes del grupo decidieron ponerle este nombre, ya que en L. casa donD. se reúnen hay varios árboles D. almendros, L. historia es acerca D. L. señora Braulia GabrieL., ya que es una integrante del grupo,  cuenta con 27 años D. edad, está casada con el señor Agustín quien es campesino, tienen hijos, Ricardo, Jennifer y Daysi, D. los cuales solo dos estudian, el mayor acaba D. entrar a tercer año D. primaria, y L. menor esta en segundo D. preescolar, y L. bebe apenas tiene 10 meses, elL. se dedica a L. elaboración y venta D. antojitos mexicanos desD. hace 3 años.

Doña Braulia se decidió por ese negocio, ya que dice que tiene mucha demanda, y le genera muy buenas ganancias, además D. que quería buscar L. manera D. sacar a sus hijos adelante, para darles una muy buena calidad D. vida, invirtió su crédito en L. compra D. mas insumos como son: jitomates, variedad D. chiles, papas, cebollas, pollos, carne, maíz, aceite, sal y demás, para continuar con L. elaboración D. sus ricos platillos.

El sueño que tiene doña Gaby (como mejor L. conocen sus clientes) y espera algún día poder cumplirlo es el D. construir un local para poner su restaurante, y así tener una mejor producción, ya que es su anhelo mas granD., también para poder mejorar e incrementar sus ingresos y así continuar apoyando a sus hijos con sus estudios y asegurar su futuro.

Nos dice que los integrantes D. su grupo, son personas muy responsables, trabajadoras y puntuales, ya que tienen tiempo D. conocerse y se llevan muy bien, puesto que viven en L. misma colonia.

ElL. esta muy agradecida con fundación realidad y kiva por el apoyo del préstamo que le otorgaron, ya que gracias a esto su negocio esta mejorando mucho.

Otros D. los compañeros D. doña Gaby son: María, Anal Aura, Minerva, Ignacia, Adán, Caritina y María Julia, quienes realizan variadas actividades como: venta D. maíz, madera, pollos, comida, ropa, zapatos, refrescos, tamales y algunos abarrotes.
texts.en:
This group is called "Los Almendritos 1" ("The little almonds 1"). The members of the group decided to name it that way because there are many almond trees around the house where they gather.
This story is about Braulia GabrieL., who is a member of the group. She is 27 years old and married to Agustín, who is a rural worker. They have children named Ricardo, Jennifer and Daysi. Only two of the children go to school - the oldest one just got into the third year of elementary school, the younger one is in the second year of preschool, and the baby is only 10 months old.
She has been making and selling typical Mexican snacks for three years. Braulia decided to get into this business because she says there is much demand for it and she makes very good profits. Also, she wanted to find a way to get her children ahead in order to improve their quality of life.
She used the loan to purchase more supplies such as red tomatoes, different kinds of pepper, potatoes, onions, chicken, meat, corn, olive oil, salt, etc., so that she can continue making her tasty snacks.
Gaby (as she is better known to her customers) hopes that someday she will be able to achieve her dream. She dreams of building a place where she can establish her restaurant and increase her production, which is her biggest wish. She also wishes to improve and increase her profits so that she can continue to proviD. education for her children and ensure their future.
She reports that the members of the group are very responsible, hardworking and punctual people. They have known each other for a long time and get along very well, because they live in the same neighborhood.
She is very thankful to Fundación Realidad and Kiva for the support and the loan she has been granted, since because of it, her business has been going much better.
Other fellow members of Gaby's group are María, Anal Aura, Minerva, Ignacia, Adán, Caritina and María Julia. They are in various activities such as selling corn, wood, chickens, food, clothing, shoes, soft drinks, tamales and some groceries.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies such as red tomatoes, different kinds of pepper, potatoes, onions, chicken, meat, corn, olive oil and salt.

loans.name: Djromahouton 1 Group

texts.fr: DJROMAHOUTON 1 est un groupe de trois personnes dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, Béatrice(dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 45 ans et vit au Bénin. Béatrice est mariée à un menuisier du nom de Romain. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Béatrice vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Béatrice n'a jamais été à l'école. Depuis environs sept ans, Béatrice vend des céréales, du lait et de la farine de manioc. Béatrice s’approvisionne dans l'un des plus grands marchés du Bénin. C’est la quatrième fois que Béatrice et les autres membres du groupe DJROMAHOUTON 1 sollicitent l’appui financier de ALIDé en vue de renforcer leur fonds de roulement et leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Djromahouton 1 group is composed of three people who live in the same district in Benin. The representative of the group, Béatrice (who has her hand raised in the photo) is 45 years old and lives in Benin. Béatrice is married to a carpenter named Romain. The couple has three children, all of whom are at school and in their care. Béatrice lives with her husband and children. The couple cover the various household expenses between them. Béatrice has never been to school. For the past seven years, she has been selling cereals, milk and cassava flour. She gets her supplies in one of the largest markets in Benin. It is the fourth time that Béatrice and the other members of the Djromahouton 1 group have requested financial help from Alidé, and their aim is to strengthen their working capital and businesses, as well as to respond better to customer demand. Their previous loans have all been repaid in full.

loans.use: to buy cereals (corn, beans etc.), milk and cassava flour

loans.name: Luz Y Esperanza Group

texts.en:
Rosa is the coordinator of her group, Luz y Esperanza (Light and Hope) 1 & 2, and her group is located in the Samana PeninsuL., a lush, rugged area with a nascent tourism industry. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their two children.

Rosa is excited to be taking her 11th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loans and growing her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying cosmetic and beauty products, and a hair dryer. Rosa is running a beauty salon. She has had this business for around 6 years. She will use the profits to invest in her business locale; she wants to have an own place, very organized and spacious. 

Rosa said her most difficult challenge has been traveling to other countries. It is very difficult for her because it is very expensive to travel and get the visa. She is very interested in other cities and cultures. She enjoys working in her beauty salon and recommending to her clients hair cuts and to change styles. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products and a hair dryer for her salon.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz Marina nació en el departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, Luz Marina tiene 41 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos de (13, 9 y 1). 

Luz Marina vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella es docente y trabaja en un colegio particular y ella enseña el curso de matemáticas en el nivel de secundaria. Ya son 15 años que se dedica a enseñar y le va muy bien. Ella también tiene un pequeño negocio familiar de venta de comestibles en su domicilio.  

En esta oportunidad Luz Marina requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz, sacos de fideos, conservas.  

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Luz Marina was born in the Department of Cusco.  Today, Luz Marina is 41 years old and married; the fruits of this union are her three children, aged 13, 9 and 1.

Luz Marina lives in the same city where she was born, and this is where she works.  She is a teacher, and works in a private school where she teaches high-school level Mathematics.  She has been teaching for 15 years, and it's going very well for her.  She also has a small family business selling foodstuffs from her home.

On this occasion, Luz Marina is requesting a loan for buying merchandise; for example bags of sugar, bags of rice, bags of noodles and canned food.

The "Comuzone IV" Communal Bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (in Peru).  Cusco is well-known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it's where you find Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy merchandise; for example bags of sugar, bags of rice, bags of noodles, and canned food.

loans.name: Gladis Guillermina

texts.es:
Gladis nació en el departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, Gladis tiene 51 años D. edad, es casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene dos hijos. 

Gladis vive en la misma ciudad donD. nació y donD. realiza sus actividades económicas, ella es secretaria y trabaja en un colegio particular. Ya son 26 años que se dedica al trabajo y le va muy bien. En sus horas Libres Gladis se dedica a la venta cosméticos.  
 
En esta oportunidad Gladis requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo perfumes, collares, aretes y otras cosas más.    

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Gladis was born in Cusco Department.  Currently, she’s 51 years old, married and has two children.  Gladis lives in the same city where she was born and where she carries out her economic activities.  She’s a secretary at the El Carmelo private school.  She’s been working for 26 years and does very well.  In her free time she sells cosmetics.

On this occasion, Gladis needs the loan to buy merchandise like perfume, necklaces, earrings and other things.

The “Comuzone IV” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial area as well as for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and also because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is here.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like perfume, necklaces, earrings and others.

loans.name: Maria Roxana

texts.es:
Maria Roxana nació en el departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, Maria Roxana tiene 42 años de edad, es viuda y tiene dos hijos de (16 y 13 años de edad). 

Maria Roxana vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella es docente y trabaja en el colegio particular El Carmelo. Ya son 25 años que se dedica a enseñar y le va muy bien. En sus horas libres Maria Roxana se dedica a la venta ropa a pedido del cliente.   

En esta oportunidad Maria Roxana requiere el préstamo para comprar ropa como por ejemplo zapatos, botas, polos, casacas y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Maria Roxana es que sus hijos se han profesionales. 
   
El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Maria Roxana was born in the Cusco department. She is 42, widowed, and has two children ages 16 and 13.

Maria Roxana lives and works in the city where she was born. She is a teacher and works at the El Carmelo private school. She has taught for 25 years and it is going very well for her. In her free time, Maria Roxana sells clothing based on customer orders.

Maria Roxana needs this loan to purchase clothing, for example shoes, boots, polos, jackets, and more. Maria Roxana's dream is for her children to be professionals.

The “Comuzone IV” Communal Bank meets every month in Cusco (Peru). Cusco is known for being a tourist and business zone, and for the traditional Inti Raymi festival. It is also known because it is the home of one of the seven wonders of the world: Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as shoes, boots, polos, jackets, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies like sugar and machines to make cakes.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita nació en el departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, Margarita tiene 61 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión y tiene cinco hijos. 

Margarita vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella se dedica a la venta de comestibles o productos de primera necesidad, ella tiene una pequeña tienda que está equipada con las necesidades básicas y la pueden encontrar desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche o hasta que se acabe el pan del día. Ya son 9 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.
 
En esta oportunidad Margarita requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo bolsas de arroz, bolsas arroz, cajas de conservas, latas de leche y botellas de aceite.    

El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Margarita was born in the Department of Cusco. Today, Luz Marina is 61 years old and married; the fruits of this union are her five children.

Margarita lives in the same city where she was born, and this is where she works.  She works selling groceries and everyday products.  She has a small store which is equipped with the necessary basics, and where she can be found from 6 in the morning until 9 at night, or until she has earned her daily bread.  She has been working in this business for 9 years, and it's going very well for her.

On this occasion, Margarita is requesting a loan for buying merchandise; for example bags of rice, crates of canned goods, tins of milk, and bottles of oil.

The "Comuzone IV" Communal Bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (in Peru). Cusco is well-known for being an area with much tourism and commerce, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because it's where you find Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world

loans.use: to buy merchandise: for example, bags of rice, crates of canned goods, tins of milk, and bottles of oil.

loans.name: Luz Mila

texts.es:
Luz Mila nació en la provincia D. Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Actualmente, ella tiene 48 años D. edad, es casada y fruto D. esta unión tiene tres hijos. 

Luz Mila radica desD. hace varios años en la ciudad del Cusco y donD. realiza sus actividades económicas, ella se dedica a elaboración D. tejidos y platería artesanal, ella tiene un  pequeño taller y está equipada con las necesidades básicas. Ya son 7 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien.

En esta oportunidad Luz Mila requiere el préstamo para comprar lana D. alpaca y alambre D. cobre. Su sueño D. Luz Mila es abrir una tienda donD. pueda vender sus productos.  
  
El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una D. las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Luz Mila was born in the Puacartambo province in the Cusco department. Currently, Luz Mila is 48, married, and has three children.

Luz Mila settled in Cusco city several years ago. There she makes weavings and silverwork. She has a small workshop which is equipped with the basic necessities. She has had this business for seven years and it is going very well for her.

Now, Luz Mila needs this loan for the purchase of alpaca wool and copper wire. Luz Mila's dream is to open a store where she will be able to sell her products.

The “Comuzone IV” Communal Bank meets every month in Cusco city (Peru). Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial zone, and for the traditional Inti Raymi festival. It is also known for being home to one of the seven wonders of the world: Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool and copper wire.

loans.name: Donata Amparo

texts.es:
Donata nació en la provincia del Cusco. Actualmente, Donata tiene 56 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. 

Donata vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella se dedica a elaboración de pasteles, tortas, bocaditos y otras cosas más, ella tiene un pequeño taller donde está equipada con las necesidades básicas. Ya son 22 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. 

En esta oportunidad Donata requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo harina, azúcar, leche, huevos, mantequilla, frutas, cocoa y otras cosas más.  
 
El Banco Comunal “Comuzone IV” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Donata was born in Cusco Province.  Currently, she’s 56 years old, married and has three children.  Donata lives in the same city where she was born and where she carries out her economic activities.  She makes cakes, pastries, snacks and other things to sell.  She has a small workshop where she has all the basic equipment.  She’s been in business 22 years and does very well.

On this occasion, Donata needs the loan to buy merchandise like flour, sugar, milk, eggs, butter, fruit, cocoa and other things.

The “Comuzone IV” communal bank meets monthly in the city of Cusco (Perú).  Cusco is known for being a very touristy, commercial area as well as for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and also because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is here.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, milk, eggs, butter, fruit, cocoa and others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beef.

loans.name: Alfa 1 Group

texts.es:
El grupo Alfa 1 se llama asi ya que los integrantes del grupo es la primera vez que se encuentran en el primer ciclo es decir primera vez que participan en el credito de Fundacion Realidad. Y como Alfa significa el comienzo de algo es por eso el significado del grupo, lo conforman tres personas que son Ana Carina, Edgar y  Amelia, cada uno de ellos ha solicitado el préstamo para diferentes fines; Edgar que es el representante del grupo invertira el prestamo para la compra de una copiadora, tres consumibles y hojas para impresion de diferentes tamaños como carta y oficio. El nos comenta que tiene 27 años de edad es casado desde hace 7 años con la señora Amelia dentro de su matrimonio han procreado dos hijos uno tiene 12 años de edad y estudia la secundaria y su hijo mas pequeño cumplio ya 6 años y se encuentra estudiando la primaria aunque ya es su ultimo ciclo escolar. 
Edgar inicio su negocio de cyber café ya que los gastos de la escuela se le hacen muy pesados, el tiene este negocio desde hace tres años solo que no tenia un lugar estable para poner su negocio y hace un año por fin pudo poner su local, su cyber aun no tiene nombre, así que segira buscando el nombre.
Hasta ahora no ha tenido ningun problema con su negocio solo cuando bajan las ganancias eso pasa por lo regular en vacaciones pero el ya esta acostumbrado dice que es algo mormal y por lo tanto no le preocupa, una de sus metas es poder llegara dar los precios mas bajos y asi hacerse de mas clientes.
Mientras tanto la señora Amelia Pidio para la comprar impresora, toner para su negocio tambien de ciber cafe, la señora Ana carina ha solicitado el credito para comprar productos de belleza "Fuller" como cremas, perfumes etc. En general el grupo esta muy contento ya que le agradece a FRAC su sincera comprension en apoyarlos y otorgarles el prestamo que mucha falta les hace.
texts.en:
The 'Alfa 1' group was given its name because it is the first time that the group's members have requested a loan from Fundación Realidad.  They are in their first loan cycle.  Also, as 'Alfa' means the beginning of something, they gave their group this name.  The group has three members: Ana Carina, Edgar and Amelia.  Each of them has requested their loan for different purposes.  Edgar is the group's representative and he will invest his loan in buying a copier, three consumables and paper for printing different sizes such as letter and legal.  He tells us that he is 27 years old and has been married to Amelia for 7 years.  The couple have two children: one is 12 years old and in middle school, and their youngest is 6 years old and in elementary school.

Edgar started his business (an Internet cafe) as his children's school expenses are very high.  He has had this business for three years.  He didn't have a stable place for his business but one year ago he finally managed to set up his premises.  His Internet cafe still doesn't have a name and he will continue looking for one.  Up to now, he hasn't had any problems with his business, only when his profits fall which usually happens during the holiday period.  However, he is now getting used to this.  He says that it is normal and therefore it doesn't worry him.  One of Edgar's goals is to be able to lower his prices so that he can attract more customers.

Amelia requested her loan to buy a printer and toner for her business which is also an Internet cafe.  Ana Carina has requested her loan to buy Fuller-brand cosmetics such as creams, perfumes, etc.  In general, the group is very happy and they are grateful to FRAC for their sincere understanding in supporting them and giving them this loan which they need so badly.

loans.use: to buy a copier, consumables and printing paper

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is married to a farmer and they both live together with their six dependants in Abura. She buys fresh fish at the seashore and comes home to fry them to sell at the market in Jukwa, Central Region of Ghana. She wants to increase her quantity of fried fish. A loan will go a long way to help buy additional fish to fry to sell.

loans.use: to help buy additional fish to fry to sell.

loans.name: Sedjlogande Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SEDJLOGANDE est composé de quatre personnes qui vivent tous dans le même quartier au Bénin. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Elisabeth est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Elisabeth est âgée de 36 ans et est mariée à un certain Casmir. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et vivant à leur charge. Elisabeth et son mari assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la famille. Elisabeth n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Afin de se prendre en charge et d'améliorer son niveau de vie, Elisabeth exerce depuis trois ans environs comme activité la vente de bois de chauffage, de boisson locale et du pain dans son quartier. Elisabeth achète ses produits au Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son revenu, Elisabeth sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe SEDJLOGANDE, un deuxième crédit.
texts.en:
The SEDJLOGANDE group is made up of four persons who all live in the same neighborhood in Bénin. This is the second time that this group is requesting a loan from ALIDé in order to raise the level of their businesses. The representative of the group, Elisabeth, is the one who is raising her hand in the photo. 

Elisabeth is 36 and is married to Casmir. The couple have two children, both in school and both living under their roof. Elisabeth and her husband share in supporting the family.  Elisabeth did not go to school. In order to be responsible for her own expenses and improve her living standard, she has been selling firewood, local brew, and bread in her neighborhood for three years. She buys her merchandise in Bénin. Wishing to satisfy her clientele and grow her income, Elisabeth is requesting a second loan, together with the other members of the group called SEDJLOGANDE.

loans.use: to buy firewood, local brew, and bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy carpentry supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy hair dye, a small machine for cutting hair, and posters.

loans.name: Los Vecinos Group

texts.es:
Éste Banco comunal se llama “Los Vecinos”, lo conforman 15 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros relacionados con el comercio, entre los cuales se encuentran, venta de ropa, preparación de frituras, masas, local en servicio de manicura, pedicura, relajación, venta de abarrotes, helados, quesos y longanizas. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Recoleta, ciudad de Santiago.
Jennifer integrante del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra en la tercera fila, ocupando el segundo lugar de izquierda a derecha, su cabello es castaño claro y viste un sweater color fucsia. 
Se dedica a preparar y vender comida rápida, específicamente pizzas, papas fritas, empanadas, sopaipillas, té y café. Sus ventas las realiza afuera de su casa. 
Trabaja en éste rubro desde hace 10 años y desde hace 2 años en forma particular, desde su domicilio particular. Sus insumos los compra en la vega (feria para comerciantes), ahí compra una vez por semana.
Comenta que su clientela va muy bien.
Jennifer trabaja los días jueves, viernes, sábado y domingo. 
Con el crédito comprará bidones de aceite, bolsas de papel, harina, masas y bebidas.
Sus metas son tener un kiosco afuera de su casa, de manera más establecida. 
Jennifer vive junto a su esposo, sus dos hijas de 7 y 3 años de edad, además junto a su padre, hermano y cuñada. 
Sus sueños son estudiar la carrera de enfermería. 
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de los créditos y servicios otorgados por Fondo Esperanza, el grupo en del cual participa es unido y comprometido. 
Recoleta es una de las 34 comunas de Santiago (capital de Chile) y se encuentra ubicada en el sector centro-norte del Santiago, región metropolitana. Cuenta con un activo comercio, destacando el barrio comercial de Patronato que ha acogido principalmente a comerciantes árabes (en un principio) y coreanos (en la actualidad).
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Los Vecinos [Neighbors] and has 15 entrepreneurs working in various areas of trade, among which are selling clothing, preparation of snacks, pastries, manicures, pedicures, relaxation, selling groceries, ice cream, cheeses and sausages. All of them live in the district of Recoleta in Santiago.

Jennifer, a member of the communal bank, can be found in the photo in the 3rd row (from the back), 2nd from the left, with light brown hair and wearing a fuchsia sweater. She prepares and sells fast food, especially pizzas, French fries, pies, sopaipillas [fried dough], tea and coffee. Her sales take place at home, outside her house.

She has been working in this field for 10 years and 2 years ago she began selling from her own home. She buys her supplies in La Vega (for fair trade) once a week. She comments that business is going very well.  Jennifer works Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday.  With this loan she will buy large containers of oil, paper bags, flour, pasta and drinks. Her goal is to be more established and have a kiosk outside her house.

Jennifer lives with her husband, her 2 daughters who are 7 and 3 years old, together with her father, brother, and sister-in-law.

Her dream is to become a nurse. She is very happy and grateful for the loans and services provided by Fondo Esperanza [Hope Fund]. This group in which she participates is united and committed.

Recoleta is one of the 34 districts of Santiago (capital of Chile) and is located in the north-central metropolitan area of Santiago. It has an active trade highlighted by the commercial village of Patronato, originally mostly Arab traders, but today mostly Koreans.

loans.use: to buy large containers of oil, paper bags, flour, pasta and drinks

loans.name: Pumamarca Group

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “PUMAMARCA” el banco se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad D. Pumamarca, en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.
La  socia Ana Marina; tiene  35 años D. edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 2 hijos D. 15 y 10 años D. edad; La socia trabaja administrando su tienda D. abarrotes,  la socia generalmente invierte el crédito en la implementación D. su tienda D. abarrotes y lo que ingresa D. la tienda D. abarrotes lo designa para los estudios D. colegio y trabajos  escolares D. sus  menores  hijos, la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora y desea dar a sus hijos una muy buena calidad D. vida, ella también paralelamente cría animales menores como aves D. corral, cuyes, chanchos entre otros, la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. arroz, azúcar, fideos entre otros productos. La socia solicita el crédito en la compra D. arroz, fideos, azúcar, harinas y otros productos.
Los otros socios se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería, obras,  venta D. comidas.
La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
Ana Marina belongs to the communal bank Pumamarca that is located in the community of Pumamarca in the province of Cusco, department of Cusco. 

Ana Marina is married, 35 years old and has 2 children, 15 and 10 years of age. She manages her own grocery store.  

She usually uses money from loans to invest in her grocery store, and the money she earns allows her school age children to attend school.  She is hard working and wants to give her children a better quality of life. 

She also breeds smaller animals such as chickens, guinea pigs and pigs among others. She is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of rice, noodles, sugar, flour, and other products. 

The other members work in agriculture, farming, construction and selling food.

Ana Marina is grateful for the help that will be given and at the same time promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase rice, noodles, sugar, flour, and other products.

loans.name: Esperanza De Vida Con El Futuro Group

texts.es: El Sr. Guillermo  es conviviente, tiene 4 hijos, Guillermo  tiene 54 años de edad  actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Esperanza de vida con el Futuro” grupo  conformado por 10  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.  Guillermo  trabaja desde hace 20  años en la venta de Locería es decir platos tazas adornos vasos, Guillermo compra por mayor y los vende a domicilio este negocio surge a raíz de que su esposa falleció y el se quedo con sus 4 hijos y tenía que mantenerlos y cuidarlos a la vez es así que trabajo muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos, Guillermo nos cuenta que hoy en dia tiene mayor clientela y la confianza de sus cliente por los buenos productos que vende, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, sus hijos pudieron estudiar, poco apoco fue comprando cosas para su hogar y sobre todo su familia cuenta con una mejor calidad de vida,  con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar Locería (Platos, vasos adornos) .Sabemos que Guillermo  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 54 years old, has 4 children, and lives together with a partner. He is a member of the community bank “Esperanza de vida con el Futuro” [Hope of Life with a Future]. Ten members who work in diverse commercial activities formed this group. Guillermo has been working for 10 years in Lucería sales, that is to say, plates, cups, knickknacks, and glasses.

Guillermo buys wholesale and sells from his home. This business came about as the result of his wife dying and he had to stay with the 4 children supporting and caring for them while at the same time working very hard in order to raise them.

Guillermo tells us that today he has more customers and the trust of his clients because of the good products that he sells.

Thanks to his fortitude and hard work he attained a higher income, allowing the children to study. Little by little he bought things for the house and above all gave his family a better quality of life.

In order to continue growing he is asking for a new loan with which he will buy Lucería plates, glasses, and knickknacks. We know that Guillermo will meet his goals with hard work and strength and that a loan from Edaprospo will help him.

loans.use: to buy merchandise from Lucería such as plates, glasses and other items

loans.name: Los Tigritos Group

texts.es: Margarito tiene 28 años D. edad es casado y no tiene niños pero dependen D. él sus padres ya que él se hace responsable D. ellos y les ayuda con los gastos D. la casa. El tiene una tienda D. abarrotes en su casa desD. hace 18 años, al princio obviamente la tienda era D. su papá y después, cuando Margarito ya era mayor, se la traspaso a Margarito ya que su papa estuvo varios años enfermo y no podía atender el negocio es por eso que se lo paso a Margarito. Comenta que el esta pidiendo un crédito a la financiera para la compra D. artículos para surtir su tienda D. abarrotes y comprar D. otras variedades D. productos, el quisiera vender alimento para pollos, frijol, arroz, maíz, shampoo, jabón etc. ya que esos productos no los venD. todavía en su tienda y el quisiera vender eso para que la gente D. su localidad no se traslaD. a otras localidades ya que su población esta muy retirada D. donD. venden esos productos. El esta muy contento D. recibir este apoyo como él le llama ya que podrá tener un poco mas D. ganancias y así darle a sus padres una mejor calidad D. vida. Los otros tres integrantes del grupo se llaman Adán, Margarito y Delfino ellos invertirán sus prestamos en la compra D. frutas y legumbres para su venta y en una tienda D. abarrotes.
texts.en:
Margarito is 28 years old, married and has no children but his parents depend on him and because he is responsible for them he helps them with the household expenses. He has had a grocery store in his house for 18 years, which obviously belonged to his father and later, when Margarito was older, it was passed on to Margarito because his father was sick for some years and could not take care of the business and that is why it became his. 

He tells us that he is asking for a loan in order to purchase items to supply his grocery store and to buy other kinds of products. He would like to sell chicken feed, beans, rice, corn, shampoo, soap and other items as he does not sell these products in his store. He would like to be able to sell them so that the local people do not have to travel to other places since they are located so far from where they sell these products. 

He is very happy to receive this support as he says he could have a little more earnings and thus be able to give his parents a better quality of life. The other three members of the group are called Adán, [another man called] Margarito, y Delfino. They will invest their loans in the purchase of fruit and vegetables to sell in a grocery store.

loans.use: to supply his grocery store

loans.name: Mahouvivi Ii Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOUVIVI II est formé de quatre personnes qui résident toutes dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Constance, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Constance est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un mécanicien du nom de Vincent. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Constance vit ensemble avec sa famille. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges familiales. Constance a arrêté l'école au cours primaire. Il y a près de trois ans que Constance mène comme activité la vente de savons et de glacières dans son quartier. Constance achète ses produits dans l’un des marchés du Bénin. C’est la troisième fois que Constance et son groupe MAHOUVIVI II sollicitent de crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit leur servira à renforcer leur activité afin de mieux répondre à la demande de leur clientèle.
texts.en:
The MAHOUVIVI II group is made up of four women who all reside in the same neighborhood in Bénin. The representative of this group, Constance, is the one raising her hand in the photo. Constance is 33 and married to a mechanic named Vincent. The couple are raising two children, both enrolled in school. Constance lives together with her family. The couple share the responsibility of providing for their household. 

Constance left her studies in primary school. For almost three years, she has been selling soap and coolers in her neighborhood. She buys her products in a market in Bénin. This is the third time that Constance and her group called MAHOUVIVI II are asking for a loan from ALIDé. This loan will bolster their businesses so that they can better respond to the needs of their clientele.

loans.use: to buy soap and coolers.

loans.name: Lidia Mariana

texts.es:
Lidia es una mujer de 45 años nacida en Latacunga en la provincia de Chimborazo. En la cordillera de "Los Andes" en la región central del Ecuador se encuentra Latacunga, la capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi la cual se encuentra a 2850 metros a nivel del mar. Tiene un clima promedio de 12 grados centígrados. Este cantón es muy conocido por su colorida fiesta de "La mama negra"  que se celebra por su independencia. 
Lidia aprendió de sus padres a cuidar ganado vacuno y vender su leche y hace 10 años ella se dedica independientemente a esta actividad. A pesar de ser madre soltera ella nos cuenta que ha sabido salir adelante con su hijo y darle todo lo necesario. Ella quiere un crédito para poder comprar más ganado, de esta manera sacar más litros de leche para venderla y así tener mejores ingresos.
Es el primer crédito con Fundación Alternativa pero nos cuenta que anteriormente las instituciones financieras le ayudaron muchísimo a tener su propio ganado ya que los costos son elevados y es difícil empezar.
texts.en:
Lidia is 45 years old and was born in Latacunga, in the province of Chimborazo. In the Andes Mountains in the central region of Ecuador is Latacunga, the capital of Cotopaxi province, which is located at 2850 meters above sea level. The climate averages 12 degrees Celsius. This county is very well known for its colorful festival called the Fiesta of the Mama Negra that is a celebration of independence.

Lidia learned from her parents to care for cattle and to sell the milk and for 10 years she has worked on her own in this activity. Despite being a single mother, she tells us that she has known how to care for her child, giving all that is necessary. She is asking for a loan in order to buy more cattle, and in this way to get more liters of milk to sell and thus have higher earnings.  

This is her first loan with Fundación Alternativa but she tells us that financial institutions have been a big help before in purchasing her own cattle as the costs are high and it is difficult to start.

loans.use: to buy cows and thus increase her business

loans.name: Asi

texts.en: Asi has displayed a few plantains as her stock was yet to arrive. She sells plantain and cassava, which she has done for about five years now. She is a widow taking care of five children. Having to provide for the daily needs of these children has not been easy. She needs a loan to purchase bags of plantain and cassava to sell to be able to take proper care of her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of plantain and cassava to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy other kinds of vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Adwoa

texts.en: Adwoa sells onions and other types of vegetables at Jukwa Market near Abura. She is married and blessed with six dependants. As part of her responsibilities she supports her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. The loan, when received, will be used to obtain bags of onions to meet the demands of her customers. Any form of increase that may come as a result of the loan will be ploughed back into the business.

loans.use: to obtain bags of onions to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to acquire more bags of palm fruits.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and other items to boost her sales.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia nació en la provincia del Calca. Actualmente, Delia tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos. 

Delia vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas, ella se dedica a elaboración de pasteles, tortas, bocaditos y otras cosas más, ella tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio y donde el taller está equipada con las necesidades básicas. Ya son 22 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. 

En esta oportunidad Delia requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo harina, azúcar, leche, huevos, mantequilla, frutas, cocoa y otras cosas más.   

El Banco Comunal “Milenium III” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial y por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y también porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Delia was born in Calca province.  She is 49, married, and they have three children.

Delia lives in the same city where she was born and where she has her business.  She makes cakes, tortes, pastries,  and other things.  In the house she has a small workshop  that is equipped with all basic necessities for the business.  She has had this business for 22 years and it’s going very well.

Now Delia needs the loan to buy ingredients such as flour, sugar, milk, eggs, butter, fruit, cocoa, and other items.


The Milenium III communal bank meets once a month in Cusco.  Cusco is known as a tourist and commercial area and for its traditional fiesta of Inti Raymi.  It is also where you can find one of the seven wonders of the world, “Machupicchu".

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as flour, sugar, milk, eggs, butter, fruit, cocoa and more

loans.name: Abena

texts.en: In front of Abena is a pan full of ladies underwear. She sells these items by moving from one place to another. She is married to a mason and they live together with her two children. She obtained junior high level of education.  She wants to increase her sales by acquiring a loan from CRAN through Kiva to buy more underwear to sell.

loans.use: to buy more underwear to sell.

loans.name: Asi

texts.en: Asi is a widow taking care of four children. Her schooling is up to the senior high level. Esi retails in cooking utensils and diapers as a peddler at Abura. She feeds, clothes and educates her children with the income she makes from her sales. The loan, when received, will be invested in cooking utensils to sell.

loans.use: to invest in cooking utensils to sell.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
Don Isidro tiene 49 años de edad, vive en unión libre desde hace 30 años con su pareja Ana tiene dos hilos uno de 15 años y uno de un año. Lo cual espera casarse muy pronto.
El dedica   a la elaboración de trajecitos deportivos, Chalequitos de lana, esta vez solicita el crédito para comprar materia prima como tela 700metros de diferentes colores, Tinta de doce a trece colores diferentes, hilo, raseros, mallas, agujas.
El comenta que en la actividad lleva ya 11 años y aprendío de forma empírica (solo viendo). Y posteriormente tomo un curso de corte y confección.
Los problemas que enfrenta es cuando las ventas bajan porque hace mucho calor y no se vende casi nada, también comenta que para encontrar la tela y pintura es un poco complicado pero nada que no se pueda resolver.
Sus éxitos son cuando vende  más, esto generalmente pasa en el mes de noviembre, diciembre y enero cuando hace frio sale a vender a otros lugares sus chalequitos y dice que le va muy bien. 
La única E. que tiene don  Isidro es obtener mejores ganancias para poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida a su familia quizás mejorando su alimentación, calzado, vestimenta y mejoramiento de vivienda. “Estoy muy agradecido, con los jóvenes que trabajan en FRAC y KIVA porque han ayudado a emprender nuevos negocios en las regiones más pobres”
texts.en:
Isidro is 49 years old and is in a common law marriage of 30 years with his partner Ana. He has two children, one 15 years old and one a year old, and so he hopes to marry very soon.

He works making woolen vests to wear when playing sports. He is asking for a loan at this time to buy raw materials like 700 meters of different colors of fabric, 12 or 13 different colors of dye, thread, measuring tools, mallets, and needles. He says that he's been in this business for 11 years and he learned by trial and error (by oberservation) and later he took a course on cutting and sewing. The problem that he faces is that sales dip when the weather is hot and he sells next to nothing. He also says that it's a little complicated to find fabric and dye but not a problem that he can't solve. His successes are when he sells more. This usually happens in the month of November, December, and January when it's cold. He goes out to sell the woolen vests in different places and he says that it goes very well. 

The only hope that Isidro has is to get more income to be able to give his family a better quality of life, perhaps improving their food, footwear, clothing, and housing. "I am very thankful to the young people who work in FRAC and KIVA because they have helped to establish new businesses in the poorest regions."

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles, and dye.

loans.name: Yaa

texts.en: Yaa is a bread baker, selling to customers who retail her products. A high school graduate, she is married to a driver, and to fulfill part of her domestic responsibilities, she uses her income to provide food for their home. A loan will help Yaa to purchase more ingredients to make bread for distribution.

loans.use: to acquire more ingredients to make bread for distribution.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 26 años de edad está casado con su esposa Jessica desde hace 2 años, los dos están formando una familia ambos están muy contentos por la llegada de su primera niña que acaba de nacer tiene apenas 5 meses.
El dedica a la elaboración de trajecitos deportivos, Chalequitos de lana, esta vez solicita el crédito para comprar materia prima como tela, tinta de doce a trece colores diferentes, hilo, raseros, mallas, agujas.
Encontrar la tela y pintura es un poco complicado pero nada que no se pueda resolver.
Sus éxitos son cuando vende  más esto generalmente pasa en la temporada otoño-invierno cuando hace frio sale a vender a otros lugares sus chalequitos y dice que le va muy bien. 
La única meta que tiene Oscar es obtener mejores ganancias para poder darle a su familia un patrimonio quizás una cas bien establecida 
“Estoy muy agradecido, ya que con su apoyo puedo seguir trabajando  y obteniendo mis ganancias”
texts.en:
Oscar is 26 years old and has been married to his wife Jessica for two years. They have started their own family and are very happy about the birth of their first daughter who is due in about five months. 

He works making woolen vests that are worn when playing sports. He is asking for a loan at this time to buy raw materials like fabric, 12 or 13 different colors of dye, thread, measuring tools, mallets, and needles. Finding the fabric and dye is a little complicated, but nothing he can't solve. His successes are when he sells more. This is generally in the autumn- winter season when the weather is cold. He goes out to sell the woolen vests in various places and he says it goes very well. 

The only goal that Oscar has is to secure more income in order to give his family a financial standing, perhaps a well-established house. "I am very thankful because with your help I can continue working and earning a better income."

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, fabric, wool

loans.name: Nadya

texts.es: Nadya, de 22 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su propia vivienda junto a su pareja Richard  de 24 años y su querida hija Cledy de 07 años de edad, a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Nadya y su pareja se esmeran en trabajar arduamente sus campos de cultivo donde siembran variedad de plantas tropicales como: cacao, café, y frutos de plátano, las cuales después de cosecharlos los lleva a vender a distintos compradores que sabiendo de la calidad y variedad de sus productos no dudan en en comprarle todo lo cosechado. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva  05 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es combatir la plaga que se apoderan de los hijuelos de cada plantación es por ello que Nadya tiene que combatirlos de manera natural colocando trampas y cortinas para no dañar el medio ambiente. Con el crédito solicitado comprará madera aserrada para poder cercar los flancos de su vivienda, para así brindarles una cobija a los miembros de su familia. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos por que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este será su cuarto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y por ello espera de un pequeño préstamo  para seguir cumpliendo con sus objetivos y se siente agradecida por trabajar conjuntamente con el resto de las socias de su banco comunal. Con el dinero podrá comprar, madera aserrada para cercar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Nadya is 22 years old and is a very joyful and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her partner Richard, 24 years old, and their beautiful daughter Cledy who is 7 years old and to whom Nadya wishes to give a better quality of life.  

Nadya and her partner do their best to work diligently in their fields where they grow a variety of tropical plants like: cacao, coffee, and plantains. Later they harvest them and take them to sell to specific buyers who know the quality and variety of their products and who do not hesitate to buy the entire harvest. The thing they enjoy most about their work is to seed their fields and have them be fertile and productive. They have been doing this work for five years and find that that most difficult aspect is combating the pests who infest the shoots of each crop. This is the reason Nadya has to fight them off with natural methods, setting traps and building fences to protect the natural environment.  

With this loan she will buy lumber to build a fence around the sides of her home and therefore give the members of her family a shelter. In the future she hopes to continue saving her income because she wants to buy new fields.This will be her fourth loan with MFP. She has been very punctual with her previous loans and for this reason she hopes for a small loan to achieve her goals. She feels very thankful to work together with the rest of the members of the communal bank. With this money she will buy lumber to fence off her home.

loans.use: to buy lumber to fence off her home.

loans.name: Blanca Josefina

texts.es:
señora Blanca Josefina tiene ya más de cinco años dedicándose a la venta abarrotes. 
  Solicita un préstamo para invertir en comprar mercancía que es productos en lata, verdura, frutas y carnes frías. 
Desea tener mas variedad para vender ya que sus clientes le están solicitando este tipo de productos y para ella será mucho mejor así tendrá más ingreso a la familia y podrá darle el estudio necesario a su hija quien esta estudiando la universidad. 
Planea pagar el crédito con una parte de las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene.
texts.en:
Blanca Josefina has been selling groceries for over five years.
She requests a loan in order to purchase merchandise such as canned goods, vegetables, fruits and cold cuts.
She wishes to sell a wider variety of goods, because her customers have been asking for this kind of merchandise and it will be much better for her. This way she will get more income for her family and she will be able to provide education for her daughter, who is a college student.
She plans to repay the loan with part of the profits she makes from her business, since it's her source of income.

loans.use: to purchase goods for the grocery store.

loans.name: Crescencio

texts.es:
Don Crescencio tiene 54 años de edad está casado con la señora Aurelia desde hace 35 años Aun tienen un niño que está estudiando la preparatoria tiene 16 años claro tuvo más hijos pero ya no dependen de él ya que todos están casados, prácticamente en casa ya solo viven él y su esposa.
El se dedica a la elaboración de trajecitos deportivos, chalequitos de lana, esta vez solicita el crédito para comprar materia prima hilo, raseros, mallas, agujas.
El comenta que en la actividad lleva ya 20 años con ésta actividad, desde muy pequeño aprendío a hacerlo.
Los problemas que enfrenta es cuando las ventas bajan porque hace mucho calor. 
La única esperanza que tiene don Crescencio es que pueda apoyar a su hijo que está estudiando todavía en la prepa ya que le gustaría fuera un gran profesionista
“Estoy muy agradecido con ayuda y confianza que depositan en mi”
texts.en:
Crescencio is 54 years old. He has been married to Aurelia for 35 years. They have a 16-year-old son who is in high school. Of course he had more children, but they don't depend on him anymore, because they are all married. He and his wife are practically the only ones living at his home now.
He manufactures sports clothing and woolen vests. This time he requests the loan in order to purchase supplies such as thread, measuring sticks, mesh and needles.
He says that he has already been in this business for 20 years; he learned it when he was very young.
The problems he faces come when sales are down because the weather is very hot.
Crescencio's only hope is to be able to support his son who's still in high scholl, because he would like his son to be a great professional.
"I'm very thankful for the help and the trust deposited in me".

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, needles, wool and fabric dye.

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
Don Ismael tiene 34 años de edad está casado desde hace 14 años con Esther quien ha formado una familia, tienen 3 hijos que aun dependen de dicho matrimonio.
El dedica a la elaboración de trajecitos deportivos, Chalequitos de lana, esta vez solicita el crédito para comprar materia prima como tela 700metros de diferentes colores, Tinta de doce a trece colores diferentes, hilo, raseros, mallas, agujas.
El comenta que en la actividad lleva ya 12 años y aprendío a hacer esta actividad viendo a su papá, pues él tambien realiza esta actividad.
Cuando vende más es en las epocas donde hace frio por lo general en invierno.
La única esperanza que tiene don Ismael es obtener mejores ganancias para poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida a su familia quizás mejorando su alimentación, calzado, vestimenta y mejoramiento de vivienda.
“Estoy muy agradecido, solo quisiera que sigan apoyando y generando más proyectos para comunidades”
texts.en:
Ismael, 34, has been married for 14 years to Esther, with whom he has 3 children who are still dependents. He makes track suits and fleece vests.

This loan will be used to buy basic materials like 700 meters of fabric of different colors, dyes in 12-13 different colors, thread, levelers, mesh, and needles.

He tells us that he has been doing this for 12 years and learned by watching his dad who did the same thing. He sells most when it's cold, which is generally in the winter. 

Ismael's hope is to earn more profits so that he can give his family a better quality of life, maybe giving them better food, shoes, clothing and shelter. 

"I am very grateful. All I want is for you to keep supporting and generating more projects for communities."

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and needles.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to procure more dresses to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of rice, tomatoes, pepper, salt to cook and to sell.

loans.name: Afua

texts.en:
Afua sells tomatoes, garden eggs (a vegetable similar to an eggplant) and other items at jukwa market. She is a widow taking care of five dependents. 

Afua has been in this business for some time now. She hopes to increase her sales and so needs a loan to purchase additional bags of garden eggs and tomatoes to sell in the market.

loans.use: to purchase additional bags of garden eggs and tomatoes to sell in the market.

loans.name: Los 4 Fantasticos Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama  los 4 fantásticos , L. mayoría D. sus integrantes  son vecinas D. L. misma localidad .L. representante D. este grupo es L. señora  Dulce Esperanza   D. 42 años D. edad esta felizmente casada con el señor Victoriano Hugo  , se hizo D. su negocio para poder sacar a delante a sus hijos y prepararlos para el futuro.
L. señora Dulce Esperanza  fue quien invito a las otras personas a formar parte  D. este grupo ; elL. se dedica a L. venta D.  D. ropa desD. hace aproximadamente cuatro años  , tiene su  local  y  brinda sus servicios desD. las 10:00 D. L. mañana hasta las 6:00 D. L. tarD.  D. lunes a sábado vente ropa para  caballero niñas y niños .
Tiene L. cantidad D. tres hijos  una mujer y dos varones.
Estudio hasta L. secundaria terminada , los domingos venD. cenas en su casa como son: tacos dorados, quesadillas y sopes, es una señora muy trabajadora le gusta salir adelante y esforzarse para lograr sus sueños .
ElL. pidió el préstamo para  comprar mas ropa  como es : pantalón para caballero, camisas, bermudas , short y vestidos .
Uno D. sus sueños es seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que terminen una licenciatura y puedan cumplir sus sueños.
Las integrantes que forman parte D. este grupo son:
Marco Antonio- se dedica a L. venta  D. carne.
Juan -  se dedica a L. venta D. ropa.
Magdalena – se dedica a L. venta D. borrego.
Geronimo- se dedica a L. venta D. abarrotes.
Victorio- se dedica a L. venta  D. refrescos.
Josefina - se dedica a L. venta D.  abarrotes.
Esperanza – se dedica a L. venta D. antojitos mexicanos.
KeiL. Ibeth - se dedica a L. venta D. carne .
Martha- se dedica a L. venta D. abarrotes.
A Le dan las gracias a fundación realidad por el apoyo que las ha dado para salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños y por ser parte D. este milagro para tener una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
This group calls itself the fantastic four. Most of the members are neighbors from the same area. The representative from this group is Dulce Esperanza, 42, who is happily married to Victoriano Hugo and they have 3 children, one daughter and two sons. She started her business to be able to help her children get ahead and prepare them for the future. She finished high school. 

Dulce Esperanza invited the others to form this group. She has been selling clothing for 4 years. She has a store that is open from 10:00am to 6:00pm Monday through Saturday. She sells clothes for men and children. On Sundays she sells dinners out of her home like fried tacos, quesadillas and soups. She is a very hardworking woman who likes to move forward and work hard to achieve her dreams. 

She asked for this loan to buy more clothing like: men's pants, shirts, bermuda shorts and dresses. One of her dreams is to keep supporting her children until they get a college degree and can achieve their dreams. 

The other members of the group are:

Marco Antonio- sells meat
Juan -  sells clothing
Magdalena – sells lambs.
Geronimo- sells groceries.
Victorio- sells sodas.
Josefina - sells groceries.
Esperanza – sells Mexican snacks.
KeiL. Ibeth - sells meat.
Martha- sells groceris.

They thank the Fundacion Realidad for the support it has given them to get ahead and achieve their dreams, and for being part of this miracle in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to sell pants, bermuda shorts, shirts and dresses.

loans.name: Wilson Nestor

texts.es:
Wilson es un joven nacido en uno de los cantones más pobres del Ecuador que es Guangaje, ubicado en la provincia de Cotopaxi. Actualmente vive en Latacunga con su esposa, con quien tiene un hijo.

Cuando migro desde su lugar de nacimiento a la capital de la provincia un hombre anciano le recibió en su casa para que viviera ahí y además le enseño a reciclar cartón. Desde hace 8 años el tiene su planta de reciclaje de cartón y vende su producto a las plantas embotelladoras. Trabaja una larga jornada de 10 horas al día. A Wilson le gustaría asistir a las capacitaciones que Fundación Alternativa da a sus clientes.

Wilson desea invertir en materia prima y en renovar su maquinaria para así obtener mejores ingresos y sobre todo dar trabajo a más personas de bajos recursos que trabajan clasificando basura. 

Uno de los mayores obstáculos que ha tenido en su vida ha sido el racismo ya que el proviene de un hogar humilde.
texts.en:
Wilson is a young man who was born in Guangaje, one of the poorest cantons in Ecuador, located in the province of Cotopaxi. Currently he lives in Latacunga with his wife, with whom he has one son.

When he moved from his birth place to the provincial capital an old man took him in and he lived in his home. He also taught him to recycle cardboard. For 8 years he has had a cardboard recycling plant and sells his product to the bottling factories. He works long shifts, 10 hours a day. Wilson likes to attend the trainings that Fundacion Alternative gives to its clients.

Wilson wants to invest in basic materials and in refurbishing his machinery so that he can get better profits and give jobs to more low-income workers who sort out the trash. 

One of his greatest obstacles in life has been racism because he comes from a poor place.

loans.use: to repair machinery and buy basic materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy maize to make corn dough for the Banku.

loans.name: Avenir De Bras De Lance Group

texts.fr:
Antoine est le coordinateur de son groupe Avenir de bras de lance.

Antoine habite dans la région nord  d’Haiti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau n`est très limitée.  Il n`est pas marié et il a 2 enfants.

Antoine a dirigé son commerce pendant les dernières 3 années. Il voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir à l achat des boeuf. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à obtenir un plus grand commerce

Des autres membres de (nom de groupe) ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme le charbonné le produits divers  cainquaille

Antoine dit que ses défis  principal sont les manques d,achats
texts.en:
Antoine is the coordinator of "Avenir de bras de lance" Group. He lives in the department of Nord, where power supply is rare and access to water is very limited. He is single and the father of two children.

Antoine has run his business for the past three years. He would like to use his loan to buy bullocks. He hopes that the loan will enable him to expand his business.

The other members of the group need their share of the loan for their businesses. They sell coal, hardware and various other articles.

Antoine says that his biggest challenge is the lack of customers.

loans.use: to buy bullocks.

loans.name: Afia

texts.en:
Afia is squatting close to some palm fruits. She is going to use the fruit to make palm oil to sell. 

She is a producer of palm oil.  Afia is married and has 4 children.  Her husband is also a farmer.  

Her loan will be used to buy palm fruit to make oil for resale.  The profit will be reinvested back into the business.

loans.use: to buy palm fruits to make oil for resale.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua sells vegetables such as fresh pepper and garden eggs.  She wants to sell other types of vegetables.  A loan will help Efua meet that goal by acquiring fresh peppers, garden eggs, onions and more.  She is divorced and has six defendants who count on her for their needs.

loans.use: by acquiring fresh pepper, garden eggs, onions and more to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to acquire extra bags of garden eggs to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cassava to process into powder for the Konkonte.

loans.name: La Capilla Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama La Capilla esta conformado por las señoras Antonia y Teresa van a comprar con su préstamo mango, tomate, chiles, cebolla, manzana, cilantro, la señora Porfiria va a comprar perfumes, desodorantes, cremas por mayoreo, la señora Araceli va a comprar zapatos de dama, caballero y niños, la señora Ángela va a comprar sartenes, burros de planchar, baterías de cocina, la señora Reyna va a comprar hilos, telas para coser, el señor Guadalupe va a comprar refacciones aceite, llantas para su taller mecánico, la señora Petra va a comprar dulces, pelones, paletas, chicharrones, la señora Marciana va a comprar zapatos por mayoreo. La señora Antonia tiene 61 años de edad,  ella vive en unión libre con su esposo, ella tiene 7 hijos mayores de edad, ella vende verduras y frutas, ella solicito su crédito para comprar verduras y frutas tomates, ejotes, chiles, cebollas, ajo, manzanas y mangos, ella inicio su negocio hace 4 años fue comprando de poquito en poquito con lo que le daba de gasto su esposo y con el préstamo de Kiva y Fundación Realidad compro mas frutas y verduras, su negocio es importante porque le gusta vender y ganar dinero para ayudar  en los gastos de los estudios de su nieto quien vive en su casa y a su nieta le puede ayudar dándole verduras y frutas, su negocio es ambulante sale a vender su mercancía con sus vecinas, su esposo y su nieto le ayudan en su negocio le van a traer la mercancía a la central, a ella le gusta salir a vender porque conoce a más personas, las ganancias de su negocio las utiliza para pagar la luz, el agua, el préstamo y para volver a invertir. Ella esta planeando ampliar su negocio meter chiles secos y lo piensa lograr con el préstamo que va a recibir de Kiva y fundación Realidad, sus sueños y esperanzas son que crezca su negocio, ser una persona mejor, que sus nietos estudien y que tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “les damos las gracias por sus préstamos y que nos sigan ayudando a  crecer nuestros negocio y nuestras familias”.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called "La Capilla" ("The Chapel").
